comments: Occam's Razor - I am glad to see they stripped most of the fancy unnecessary features. You can take a session with a trainer as a guest. Awsome! But, for new users, it is not very clear how they should proceed. Unless they take Master Clases they wouldn't understand what to do. I suggest the app should play the audio guided-meditation steps when we request for a sitting with a trainer. Of course, they should be able to check a box to skip it. --- Earlier Review --- Very convenient to request for remote meditation sessions with a trainer. Awesome. Now a days, not many apps provide support phone numbers and email addresses. This app offers the same. Checkout Profile->Settings->Help.
Very Useful to take Remote Meditation session. Previous Taken Sittings with Dates not available, please provide. In previous Apps - Details about Prefect Name with photos was there. Please add that.
This system made me realise the objective of my existence. The application is super easy to use and understand. You just need a Heart to experience. STRONGLY RECOMMEND!
Real time.. please add the feature whether beginner or existing in the main menu.
For the first time in last 13 years I relaxed completely‚ù§ I am in tears and cant thank this app enough. Totally totally loved it

title: 7 Cups: Anxiety & Stress Chat
description:
Feeling worried, sad, stressed or lonely? Need to talk to someone? Download 7 Cups now for FREE anonymous emotional support & counseling from trained active listeners. Easy to use text chat. Real listeners available for you 24/7 & that‚Äôs not all:

- Chat 1-1 with a listener any time
- Calm yourself with 300 free mindfulness exercises
- Get personalized care with our free wellness test
- Boost your mood with simple activities
- Learn & grow from short videos 
- Feel supported in chat rooms & community forums
- Access online message therapy with licensed therapists
 
We start you on a ‚Äúgrowth path‚Äù that will encourage and support you as you take daily steps to become stronger.

Thousands of people use 7 Cups every week.

EMOTIONAL SUPPORT ON DEMAND:

Feeling stressed, anxious, or depressed? Having relationship problems? Sometimes you need to vent. Finding and scheduling a therapist can be time-consuming and expensive, and you can‚Äôt always open up to friends, family, or coworkers.

Now you can get emotional support anytime, anywhere with 7 Cups. This app gives you the help you need, fast and free, in a way that fits your life.

‚Ä¢ Connect anytime, anywhere with listeners who care
‚Ä¢ Speak your mind without any fear of being judged
‚Ä¢ All listeners trained in active listening

IN THE MEDIA:

Founded by a licensed psychologist, 7 Cups has been featured in LifeHacker (‚ÄúTechnology can help you find someone to chat with about your problems to, or even connect you with a professional that can offer lasting, long-term help‚Äù), Medical Daily (‚ÄúTalking therapy for people on-the-go‚Äù), and TechCrunch (‚ÄúOne of the top 8 startups from Y Combinator‚Äôs Summer ‚Äô13 Demo Day‚Äù).

100% CONFIDENTIAL:

Remain 100% anonymous. No one will ever know who you are‚Äînot even your listeners or therapists.

LISTENERS WHO CARE:

Our listeners are volunteers. They aren‚Äôt getting paid; they‚Äôre here because they want to help.

They care.

We have over 160,000 trained listeners and licensed therapists to choose from. Listeners provide support across 189 countries and in 140 languages. Each listener has a profile with reviews and a list of categories that they specialize in, ranging from panic attacks and bullying to eating disorders, surviving a breakup, and more.

When you find the listener you want, connect instantly via chat. Try a new listener each time, or pick one listener and develop a deeper ongoing relationship.

FAST & FREE:

The app is free to download, and all listeners are 100% free. After you download the app, you can start a conversation in less than 60 seconds.

UPGRADE PRICING & TERMS

7 Cups offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
$12.99/month
$94.99/year

Your 7 Cups upgrade will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

7 Cups also offers a Forever subscription paid for in a single non-renewing upfront payment of $399.99 granting unlimited access to 7 Cups Upgrade forever.

Read more about our terms and conditions here:

Read more about our terms of service and privacy policy here:
http://www.7cups.com/privacy.php

Download 7 Cups and start feeling better today!

If you love 7 Cups, please take 20 seconds to give us a nice review. It really helps! For other feedback, contact info@7cups.com. Thank you.

For users aged 13+.

comments: Hey 7 Cups Team! I really like the idea of your network. But this app definitely needs improvements. I am visual impaired so I had my phones font size in a large level... which wasn't possible with this app. I couldn't open a chat or other things. I tried to use it with TalkBack then, which didn't work as well. Please improve the app and make it more accessible. Thanks!

Great concept but needs improvement. The chat function is glitchy, and there's more functionality on the website than the app. I really wanted to use this app and might change my review if the bugs are fixed. The initial bot chat interface bounces around back to the top and gives error messages. Was not able to take some sort of evaluation because of it. I thought the monthly subscription was for talking with a therapist. But that's another $150.

notifies whenever someone like a listener says something to you, it's more faster to access than on your computer, and it's pretty good overall :) all of the features aren't on there like on a computer but it still provides you with the important things like the communities, forums, and chats with people! i was surprised with how supportive and friendly <3 the people are on here that listens to what you have to say and you can help out people by becomimg a listener which can make you feel good!

Very Helpful! I was pleasantly surprised with how much this app assisted me in a time of great stress and frustration. My only complaint was that the chat was extremely glitchy when I tried to scroll up and read the older messages above, it wouldn't let me at times. Hopefully they can fix the chat glitches to make it more user friendly, because then it would be perfect.

I would love to give this app 5 stars but I can't. It's just that whenever I feel down, I go chat with the bot but the app glitches so much that I can't even read the messages. One time we are discussing something new but then it glitches out and it puts me onto an older part of our conversation. I- I just don't know what to do. I know it was not intentional, but still. Please fix this. 7 Cups has a lot of potential and I would be sad if it was all wasted.

title: Beat the Boss 4: Stress-Relief Game. Hit the buddy
description:
Let off some steam in this action adventure game with over 20,000,000 + downloads from the creators behind Tap Titans 2 and Battle Bouncers.  

Get ready to aim, shoot, and destroy evil robot bosses in the smashing new update to the epic Beat The Boss franchise. 

Dealing with a cruel robot boss who‚Äôs nothing more than a bully? Looking at them just makes you want to beat the living daylight out of them.

Turn that rage and office stress into a therapeutic release as you fight against the clock to explode, beat, and destroy the evil robot Boss Joe. 

Crush enemies and your own personalized villains with custom crafted weapons. Release the mass havoc of monkeys, wield a samurai sword, or unleash the explosive power of a colossal diarrhea gun on your workplace foes! 

WITH BEAT THE BOSS 4 YOU CAN:
‚òÖ PLAY the relaxing interactive office simulator offline and at your desk
‚òÖ FIGHT against 200+ uniquely designed wicked bosses who make life miserable 
‚òÖ COLLECT over 190+ destructive weapons and build up your arsenal of ammunition 
‚òÖ UNLOCK the immersive world map, with over 10 hand drawn realms and 30 entertaining stages
‚òÖ CRAFT custom weapons from automatic rifles to fireworks in order to release your anger
‚òÖ PERSONALIZE your own custom boss, get ready to crush your real-life nemesis! 
‚òÖ LEVEL UP your boss fighting skills by collecting gold and diamonds to boost your destructive power

ABOUT BEAT THE BOSS 4:
Robo Joe is on a mission to make your workplace hostile and miserable! 
Don‚Äôt want to walk into that familiar office on Monday morning? Dealing with the unresolved stress from the last time your boss made your life difficult? Beat The Boss 4 is the healthy way of dealing with office stress and it's better than yoga! 

Get back virtually at your dentist, smash that high-school bully, or travel to space to defeat aliens in this interactive simulation action game. As you adventure down the scenic world map, find out where Robo Joe‚Äôs from and why you need to take vengeance and 
kick his ignorant robot buddies. Collect gold coins and diamonds with each hit as you whack your boss to buy hilarious and more destructive weapons, turning that office into a war zone!

From beehives to office supplies, and even grenades, the possibilities to get back at your foes are endless. Beware, don‚Äôt let your coldhearted android manager go into their shield! Customize weapons to unleash devastating attacks and let out that pent up anger in the ultimate stress relief game. 

Wage war with the evil Robo Joe and his machine buddies. Buckle up and prepare to riot as you grab your guns and assassinate an onslaught of horrible bosses in this funny fighting game! Drop and smash massive weapons on your robot foes, and reel in that satisfactory feeling from hunting your enemies! 

Your therapist and colleagues will thank you so start taking revenge and go have some fun!

TALK TO US!
Join your fed up coworkers on
‚òÖ Facebook: facebook.com/beatthebossgame
‚òÖ Discord: discord.gg/gamehive
‚òÖ Twitter: twitter.com/beattheboss4
‚òÖ Instagram: instagram.com/beatthebossgame
‚òÖ Blog: gamehive.com/blog
‚òÖ Youtube: youtube.com/user/GameHiveVideo

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* ‚ÄúI‚Äôm generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‚ÄòConcentrate on your body‚Äô‚Äù - New York Times

* ‚ÄúIn the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses‚Äù - Mashable

* ‚ÄúEliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal‚Äù - Tech Republic

* ‚ÄúFound myself similarly refreshed afterwards‚Äù - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.
descriptionHTML:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep

* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts

summary: Join the millions discovering the life-changing benefits of meditation with Calm
recentChanges: Thanks for using Calm! This update contains multiple bug fixes and performance improvements. As always, you can expect an original Daily Calm every day, new music and Sleep Stories every week, and new Meditation programs every month.
comments: I have used this app for over 4 years! I had the free version for a year and a half and loved it but wanted a little more. I use the paid version now. It doesn't cost anymore than any streaming service, actually cheaper than my Netflix and even Hulu. I'd give up both for this app if I had to. Helps with my sleep , my kid's sleep and our mental growth. I highly recommend using this!

Stopped before I even started. This app expects you not only to have to sign in and create an account straight away, but the "free" trial also requires you to sign up with an active credit card before you even get to experience anything. I personally hate this way of working and tend to turn away from all apps that insist on this model. Installed and deleted within ten minutes.

11th month update: Now I am trying to delete my subscription it is sooooo difficult. Unbelievable. I would never recommend this app. They have hidden the subscription change, created many bugs like your browser does not support... I am trying to unsubscribe using the app itself, but surprisingly it is not working because of java or smtng. Why you would need java to unsubscribe. You are trying to rob the users. Making it difficult so that they will give up, and you will continue making money

I tried the 7 days free trial and i found the meditation offered quite poor. Mostly too short and way too much talking, and not even in a soft spoken tone. I couldn't play any of its music in the background. Maybe my fault, but ok, since a lot of the music on offer is pop commercial singer stuff. I also didn't like the 'well done, set a reminder' type of approach. A meditation app should provide escape from the manic, 'like' addictive type of world, not mimic it. Disappointed

This app changed my life. It really helped me became a calmer person and have clarity. My mind is much more peaceful and have significantly less troubling and negative thoughts, even when I do have them sometimes, I'm able to distinguish them as just thoughts and not my reality. This is a really helpful app and I'm so thankful to the creators and all those who worked hard to get it working as good as it is.

title: Happify
description:
Happify‚Äôs science-based activities and games can help reduce stress, overcome negative thoughts, and build greater resilience by providing effective tools and programs to improve emotional well-being.
 
Our techniques are developed by leading scientists and experts who've been studying evidence-based interventions in the fields of positive psychology, mindfulness and cognitive behavioral therapy for decades.

86% of people who use Happify regularly report feeling better about their lives in 2 months!

HAPPINESS ISN‚ÄôT JUST ONE THING. IT‚ÄôS EVERYTHING.

Struggling with everyday challenges and being gripped by negativity can be toxic to one's emotional and physical well-being, relationships, and performance at work. So when you start to turn the corner, and begin to learn the new habits of successful engagement with life, everything starts to look brighter and better.

SKEPTICAL JOURNALISTS TRIED IT FOR THEMSELVES, AND HERE‚ÄôS WHAT THEY SAID:

ABC World News' Mara Schiavocampo
"I gave it a shot for 5 weeks...it works!"

The New York Times
"Each track contains bite-size quizzes, games and activities that guide you to seeing more positive aspects of daily life."

The TODAY Show
"These are things you can do every day -- tasks you can complete and be rewarded for -- to feel better, reduce stress, live a better life, & actually be happy."

Katie Couric: World 3.0 on Yahoo
‚Äú[Happify] evaluates what's keeping you from a high happiness quotient, then you're given games and activities that will boost your mood, like Uplift, Serenity Scene, and Gratitude Walk."

YOU KNOW YOUR GOALS. WE KNOW HOW YOU CAN ACHIEVE THEM.

Choose one track. Choose them all.

* Conquering negative thoughts
* Coping better with stress
* Building self-confidence
* Fueling your career success
* Achieving mindfulness through meditation
* ‚Ä¶and 30+ more!

Happify is free to download and use. It‚Äôs a great way to get started, and discover why so many people upgrade to Happify Plus for access to even more:

* Unlimited access to 30+ tracks;
* Your 20-page character strength report, offered in partnership with the renowned VIA Institute
* Track your progress everyday and see how your skills compare
* and more!

Because we know that everyone has different financial resources, we offer Happify Plus in a variety of plans, for as low as $11.67/month.

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off (by going to Account Settings) at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. You cannot cancel the current subscription during the active subscription period.

Privacy Policy: http://www.happify.com/privacy
Terms & Conditions: http://www.happify.com/terms

Website: http://www.happify.com
Help: support@happify.com

comments: This app is actually great! It helps me to communicate people, be more confident, and find my career. I like the videos and articles, it gives us empathy and change your skills. The activities are fun. I like that one game called "Negative knockout" because the game wipe out my worries. The other activity I like is the "Kindness Chain." because it really thoughtful to compliment people and get rid of negative thoughts. I love this app, it change the way I feel.

Your App works very slow, it's damn irritating, I am giving 1 Star without even knowing your features because I am already very frustrated with the way your app is responding. How am I suppose to use it's features when it has already Irritated me. This kind of App should be more convenient and must work properly, you are only frustrating people more. You may not be aware of this but now if you know please develope your App.

I have a strong philosophical gripe with some of the ideas this app presents, which I was unable to bring up with them because there is no way to contact anyone with questions. Then they hit me up for money, so I'm done.

Kept crashing and making me restart finished activities from the beginning, making my stress and anxiety worse. While I'm sure it genuinely helps when it's working correctly, I've not had a good experience with this app.
This app keeps me on track during these crazy times! I wasn't keeping up with journaling and Happify helps me stick to my destressing strategies in a fun and easy way.

title: Yoga for Relief of Anxiety, Stress and Depression
description:
The app includes antistress yoga poses and asanas that will help you get rid of stress, depression, fear and anxiety. This app improve your mood, health, relax you.

There are enough stress factors around each of us, from a crush in the subway to difficulties in learning, work, family. Modern man needs immunity to the daily problems and inspiration to solve them. One of the most effective ways to handle stress and depression is yoga. Coming from the East, the practice has covered almost all the countries of the world. Yoga classes were acknowledged to be effective at the UN level. Yoga is loved by stars such as Madonna, Sting, Keanu Reeves, David Duchovny, Charlize Theron.

Do you think that everything effective is expensive? Not at all: trainings, including meditation poses and exercises stretching muscles today can be performed for free. All that you spend - is a few minutes to install the mobile application "Yoga for Relief of Anxiety, Stress and Depression".

The application contains:
1. Clearly demonstrated yoga asanas that can be easily performed after the instructor
2. Known trainers advices on how to do the exercises 
3. Information block with explanation, how the yoga against stress and anxiety works
4. Light music accompaniment for a better relaxation
5. Step-by-step trainings, leading from simple things (deep breathing, smooth muscle stretching) to complex ones ( "Lotus" and other well-known yoga poses)

App "Yoga for Relief of Anxiety, Stress and Depression" is yoga for beginners following postures:
1. Shavasana.
2. Ardha Chakrasana.
3. Apanasana.
4. Pavan Muktasana (left).
5. Pavan Muktasana (right).
6. Supta Padangusthasana (right).
7. Supta Padangusthasana (left).
8. Supta Matsiendrasana (right).
9. Supta Matsyendrasana (left).
10. Supta Matsyendrasana.
11. Halasana.
12. Karnapidasana.
13. Matsiasana.
14. Supta Baddha Konasana.

Training will give you not only the flexibility of muscles. You will have the ability to quickly restore energy balance. Antistress yoga for relaxation will gently remove the irritation and fatigue of a hard day.

Reminding you, "Yoga for Relief of Anxiety, Stress and Depression" app is absolutely free. Internal refresh, calmness, cheerfulness, flexibility and with zero cost. The app is fully universal, so it can be used by all those who are often exposed to stress: students, athletes, young parents. Yoga is also helpful to representatives of professions subject to overstrain: office workers, businessmen, managers.

All you need is 15-20 minutes a day, calm atmosphere, small rubber or textile mat and comfortable clothes. No tedious trips to the gym - you train at convenient time and in a convenient location at home, in a hotel, in nature or in the office during a break. Very soon you will find an appropriate balance of loads and meditation for yourself. Practicing anti-stress yoga for relaxation, you will notice that you have become much less subjected to daily stress, act calmly and efficiently.

Proved: Yoga against anxiety is one of the most effective means of fighting stress factors of the 21st century. Traditional options for mental relaxation are going to the cinema, restaurant, etc., provide only a short-time effect. While yoga is a whole philosophy of environmentally friendly, wise and joyful life. That is why the whole world is talking about the effectiveness of yoga against stress. In addition, this facility is available to everyone, as is the case with our free mobile app. We have carefully collected everything that yoga against anxiety has to offer, and presented in the most convenient form.

It was a nice app but some poses I could not do and could not follow cause it wasnt in english

title: SRCH! Anti stress coloring games, drawing games
description:
Search, find and color! Colorful drawing games for adults - bright pictures, tricky quests with hidden objects and much more fun! Anti stress guaranteed ‚ò∫Ô∏èüå¥

Coloring book has a special place among anxiety relief apps. What can be more relaxing than to color by number or drawing step by step? That‚Äôs why we created SRCH! - unique and addictive art color game. 

Why unique? Because SRCH! includes 3 in 1
ü¶ÑColoring pages with bright pictures (animals, people, cartoons and more)
‚õ±Ô∏èColor therapy & anxiety relief
üß†Brain train games (paint puzzle - search and find hidden objects)

Suitable for all ages! Lots of people use SRCH! for education, to learn colors, learn to draw and develop fine motor skills. Adults love to use SRCH! for coloring mandala and as an anti stress reliever. 

If you are familiar with coloring by numbers, you‚Äôll enjoy drawing with SRCH! too. But here is the trick üòè First, you need to search and find hidden objects on the picture. Second, you press and get them colored in a certain color. Once you find and paint all object, you get a colorful image üòç Color and play, watch how the picture‚Äôs color change and enjoy! 

Paint quiz and color games for adults üë®üë© 
Adults will enjoy a paint puzzle. You need to find hidden objects and color them. And it can be really tricky, depending on the level. 

Stress and anxiety relief games üßò 
SRCH! is very relaxing as you need to concentrate. As most anti stress games, it clears your mind and calms you down. It feels like a real meditation! And you also enjoy the colors and develop art taste.

For those who like pixel painting by numbers, we‚Äôve added a new category. Now you can enjoy both –∞) drawing pictures made of objects and b) pixel coloring games for adults. 

Try our anti stress coloring book right now and enjoy a huge collection of fun paint puzzles. 
- Dragons, unicorn, monsters (most popular).
- Fairy tale dolls and princesses, cartoons.
- Flowers and mandala drawing games for adults.
- Animals coloring pages (dogs, cats, pandas).
- People.
- Patterns.
- And more art games to color stress away for all ages!

You will never get bored - we present to you over 150 amazing pictures for coloring, and we are constantly adding new images. 

Take pleasure in coloring with fun games for adults:
- New coloring pages: find hidden objects to color them.
- Lots of paint puzzle games.
- Quick sharing with friends.
- Color and recolor pictures anywhere, anytime!
- Tips will help you find items no matter how difficult draw games are.
- Various levels - finding items in pictures is fun and rewarding for beginners and masters!
- One of the best antistress games: pleasing color therapy.

Believe it or not, many psychologists suggest coloring as an alternative to meditation. So when you color pages, this is activity is therapeutic for your body and spirit. For example, mandala coloring is a very calming, relaxing and stress relieving tool.

Escape from daily routine with SRCH! paint games. Train your brain, attention and creativity. Improve concentration, practice search skills, find objects and solve puzzles! 

Create your own drawing book! SRCH is a coloring app that opens the world of art for everyone. 
Pick an image puzzle, find items, and make them come alive in vibrant, vivid colors! Finish a puzzle from a drawing book and proudly add it to your pics list. 

If you like to paint by number enjoy antistress relaxation toys, you‚Äôll love SRCH! Try our drawing games and tricky color puzzles with hidden objects. Color and play and relax!

comments: Hello, Thank You for this awesome game. I play it for hours each day. But I will have to uninstall the game. This game SRCH uses up my Moto G6 play battery, under app info I even restricted background usage of data and restricted background battery. No of this helps. I just played the game for 1 hour and 47 mins and your game used 7% of my battery. Out of 45 games this game uses most. Any suggestions to prevent your game from using so much battery .

This was great until it RIPPED ME OFF !!!! üò°üò° . I had 2 of the feature that you tap it and it fills in all of that shape . So the first 2 times that I tried , nothing happened . On the thurd try it filled in all of the turnips . When I tried to use the second one , it did not work , it only colored one hot pepper BUT NOT ALL . BUT it showed I had used the second one , no more of that feature was left and that if I wanted more I had to watch an ad !! üò° Give that back , I will give 5üåü .

I don't know what's going on. But the app won't get passed the first page all it does is shows the red bar almost done loading to get to the page with the puzzle but it won't get passed that page. Pisses me off. I really like this game, I have Moto g stylus. Can you please fix this problem. Update still won't get passed the loading screen. Smh. Even when I have Wi-Fi. I'm so bummed I love playing this game. . guess I'm stuck to find a another game. Bummer. May you guy Guys can make more.

The game is a lot of fun but it lags badly, says that a puzzle is unfinished when it clearly is, freezes and doesn't let you pick another puzzle unless you go out and come back in and sometimes in the middle of a puzzle all the uncolored pieces disappear and you have to leave and come back in to finish it.

I did give this game 5 stars. I have to drop it down because before they fixed the non existing bugs, it worked perfectly. It would work alot faster if you could pay to have the ads removed. That's not an option yet (hint hint). But now the auto focus goes in and out at random times. Instead of just being able to click on the little picture. I now have to tap it up it 5 times. Then i give up and look for another one. How can I uninstall your new "fix" so I can have the original game back?

title: Anti-Stress Sounds
description:
When things get difficult at work, school, or in your personal life, we've found a way to help you manage your stress. We've created the perfect collection of Anti-Stress Sounds that will aid you in calming your nerves, relaxing and restoring your health.


These sounds will be your sound therapy whenever your level of stress becomes overwhelming. This app uses the calm sounds to soothe you back into a relaxed state. All sounds have carefully arranged harmonies, rhythms, and bass lines to help slow a listener's heart rate, reduce blood pressure and lower levels of the stress hormone cortisol. 

With our smart timer, you can see how long does it take to restore your balance and try to reduce that time as you practice your relaxation methods.

You may use this app in several ways:

-to help reduce your stress level by browsing through the sounds and finding the ones that suit you best;

-if you decide to rise from sleep with one of these relaxing sounds, just set it as your alarm;

descriptionHTML:
When things get difficult at work, school, or in your personal life, we've found a way to help you manage your stress. We've created the perfect collection of Anti-Stress Sounds that will aid you in calming your nerves, relaxing and restoring your health.


These sounds will be your sound therapy whenever your level of stress becomes overwhelming. This app uses the calm sounds to soothe you back into a relaxed state. All sounds have carefully arranged harmonies, rhythms, and bass lines to help slow a listener's heart rate, reduce blood pressure and lower levels of the stress hormone cortisol.

With our smart timer, you can see how long does it take to restore your balance and try to reduce that time as you practice your relaxation methods.

You may use this app in several ways:

-to help reduce your stress level by browsing through the sounds and finding the ones that suit you best;

-if you decide to rise from sleep with one of these relaxing sounds, just set it as your alarm;

-in this age of constant bombardment with pings, dings, texts, emails, you should choose the sounds of your ringtones and notifications carefully, this is why we made an option for you to use some of our soothing anti-stress sounds as your default ringtone, contact ringtone or notification sound.

Features:

‚úì high quality sounds
‚úì handy timer ‚Äì music automatically turns off
‚úì ability to set melody as ringtone, alarm or notification
‚úì beautiful background images for each anti-stress sound
‚úì works offline, no internet needed
‚úì simple design and intuitive controls

We are constantly working on improving our apps and making them more useful to our users. This is why we need your feedback. Please feel free to contact us for any issues you might have or suggestions on how we could improve our apps.

title: Stress Test App
description:
The Stress Test App is part of the Health Fountain ‚ÄòStress in the City‚Äô ‚Ñ¢ series of Apps, which allow you to determine the level of stress you may be currently experiencing. Prolonged stress can have serious long-term physiological and emotional consequences, which if not addressed, may affect your well-being and lifestyle. 

Other Apps in the series allow you to check the well-being of your adrenal glands (Adrenal Fatigue Test App) and whether you may be heading for burnout (Adrenal Burnout Test App.)

The ‚ÄòStress in the City‚Äô ‚Ñ¢ series consists of:
I: Stress Test App (this App)
II: Adrenal Fatigue Test App
III: Adrenal Burnout Test App

It is recommended that you start with the Stress Test App, and then depending on your results, move onto the other Apps in the series, viz. the Adrenal Fatigue Test App and the Adrenal Burnout Test App. 

The Stress Test App does not require you to supply any personal contact information and it is quick and easy to use. Check your stress level today.

The ‚ÄòStress in the City‚Äô ‚Ñ¢ series is designed to let you know if it may be advisable to consult a naturopathic healthcare professional to help address the symptoms you may be experiencing.

title: Stress Less Cards
description:
Do you want to experience less stress and more life? Get into the right headspace and calm your nerves with the help of the Stress Less Cards. Make easy, stress and anxiety relief exercises amidst your busy everyday life. Soothe, keep calm and start your first 5 exercises right away without registration.

FEATURES

‚Ä¢ 50 soothing, stress and anxiety relief exercises that make use of Mindfulness, NLP (Neuro-linguistic programming) and other efficient stress management techniques.
‚Ä¢ 28 exercises with spoken guidance (guided meditation) with an option for relaxing music.
‚Ä¢ 10 minutes or shorter guided audio exercises for your stress management.
‚Ä¢ Keep calm and surprise yourself with a random exercise.
‚Ä¢ Reduce anxiety with your favorite exercises by using mindfulness and guided meditations.
‚Ä¢ Soothe, calm your nerves and get some headspace by creating reminders to relieve the stress and anxiety on a regular basis.


The diverse exercises of the Stress Less Cards app are already used by many doctors in occupational health care, psychologists, psychiatrists, therapists and trainers. Get rid of anxiousness with Stress Less Cards!

Ideal for:

‚Ä¢ Stress and anxiety relief with guided meditations
‚Ä¢ Soothing voice guidance that helps to calm down and relax
‚Ä¢ Stress reduction for a better sleep
‚Ä¢ Feel better by reducing mental and emotional strain

The stress and anxiety management exercises are divided into six categories: noticing your body, breathing, watching and observing, awakening positive emotions, visualization, and conscious action.

Please feel free to contact us with your feedback or suggestions at hello@heysun.fi. 
We love to hear from you!

Follow us on: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/stresslesscards
Instagram: https://instagram.com/stresslesscards

Please leave a review if you like our app. Thanks!

title: Mind Ease: Anxiety Relief
description:
‚ÄúIt felt great knowing I had somewhere to turn when I was nervous or upset. It helped a lot to know that I could consistently help myself feel better, and that gave me a sense of confidence that improved my day-to-day tension.‚Äù

Meet Mind Ease, the growing anxiety relief self-care app that has been proven to reduce negative feelings in 91% of uses.

Helping you take charge of your own mental health and wellbeing, we have collected the most clinically proven, science-backed techniques that will reduce your anxiety, stress and tension in 7 minutes - as well as improving your mood. 

Feel better with Mind Ease: we tailor our exercises to your needs and use the latest research to bring you short 7-minute exercises that will help you to feel calm and reduce stress. Endorsed by psychologists and other mental health professionals, Mind Ease is growing as a leading stress-reduction app. 

HOW DOES MIND EASE WORK?

Open the Mind Ease app when you‚Äôre feeling stressed, anxious, or worried and tap on the Calm Me button to start a quick anxiety-reducing exercise. 
Mind Ease helps you mindfully reflect on how you‚Äôre feeling at the moment, walks you through an easy stress-relief exercise, and logs your feelings after the exercise to improve your customized anxiety-reduction program for the future.

Each exercise is explained before you begin, so you will always understand what‚Äôs coming next and how the app is working to reduce your anxiety, and improve your mood. 

Mind Ease‚Äôs Explore page has a range of tools, activities and guides that help you to understand some of the causes and mechanisms behind anxious feelings and negative thoughts. You can use these to build up your awareness of how to care for your mental health, as well as to plan for how you might manage stressful situations in the future. 

HOW IS MIND EASE CUSTOMIZED FOR ME?

With your own personalized account, you have full control over your profile, what exercises are shown to you, what reassuring messages you see on the home page, and more.
By tracking your level of anxiety before and after each exercise, you are also able to view your progress and record which exercises are the most helpful for you. Because each person‚Äôs experience is unique, Mind Ease learns which exercises work the best for you, and offers a customized range of exercises to better help you in the future. 

HOW DOES MIND EASE HELP ME GET BETTER AND REDUCE MY ANXIETY?

The Mind Ease Insights page tracks your progress and shows you trends over time which exercises are best for you. Your recent exercise history shows how much your mood has improved for each time you used the app, so you can easily reflect on when Mind Ease helped the most.
These insights also track your reduction in negative feelings and overall mood improvement statistics, so you can see how well Mind Ease has worked since Day One.

WHAT MAKES MIND EASE WORK SO WELL FOR ITS USERS?

Mind Ease leads the way in anxiety relief by using evidence-based exercises that are used in clinical settings, and help a wide range of people who are struggling with anxiety. Our exercises help reduce anxiety symptoms and negative emotions quickly and reliably - an empowering system of self-care and stress relief, when you need it. 

Our results are powerful and evidence based - our users report they feel better 91% of the time after using our app. Mind Ease is one of the few apps that tracks improvement in feelings with each use - providing valuable information about which exercises work best for you, and how much you are improving. 

WHAT EXERCISES DOES MIND EASE HAVE?

We only include the most clinically proven and recognized exercises supported by therapists and psychologists. Exercises include:
‚Ä¢ Progressive Muscle Relaxation
‚Ä¢ Deep Breathing Visualisation
‚Ä¢ Mindfulness Meditation
‚Ä¢ Anxiety Defusion
‚Ä¢ Cognitive Therapy
‚Ä¢ Visualization
‚Ä¢ Reflective Writing
‚Ä¢ Positive Reappraisal
‚Ä¢ Gratitude Journaling
‚Ä¢ DARE Response
‚Ä¶ and more.

comments: This app is quiet helpful. At first when I tried the app I wasnt taking it seriously but when I opened up to it to see if it would help it has helped me a bit. I have really bad anxiety, generalized/health anxiety and majority of the time I forget to get on the app but when I do I feel more relieved and have my thoughts more collected than out of control all over the place. I dont pay the app for special exercises or anything and it good.

They say the free version has several exercises, but when I entered my mood info, a message said, 'you aren't having negative thoughts so try one of our many activities.' But ALL activities were locked. And ALL 'Guides' were locked. There were no exercises for me to use. How can I decide to go Premium if I can't try anything in the free version first? I don't like giving low ratings before contacting the developer first - but I could not find any contact info anywhere - another pet peeve.

It's not accurate to say you have a choice of exercises. Unless you pay, you get one exercise, whether it's one you like or not. The exercises are nice, but this app has nothing BUT its 11 exercises, and charges as much as apps with a whole library of meditations and tools. It's enjoyable to use but they are asking a ridiculous price for so little content compared to the competitors.

I got mind ease early and was gifted a full subscription! I really enjoy the full experience and It has helped me manage my anxiety really well. The calm me function is really cool and helps give you an experience tailored to what you're feeling without you having to pick it in your moment of panic which is a great feature. I hope by this time next year I will financially be able to continue my subscription because it is well worth the money imo!

I was halfway through the very first pre exercise and I felt so much better. Towards the end I had a slight emotional release, which was very much needed and I am still genuinely surprised. I cannot wait to dive deeper into this app. Thank you so much for creating this, it is truly going to help a lot of people!

title: Exam Stress
description:
This app is for people who suffers from exam anxiety or from feeling stressed during their studies.

The app is developed by the Student Counseling Service, who on a daily basis helps students all over the country with psychological and social problems. It derives from many years of experience in helping students to manage their exam anxiety.
 
The app is divided into three parts:

- The first part contains tools that get you to calm down right up to the exam. They can be used when you feel anxiety symptoms and need to regain your composure.

- The second part consists of advice on the oral exam, written exam and the days before and after an exam.

- The third part consists of tools to prevent exam anxiety and study-related stress. This is, for example techniques to plan the reading load or to sleep better at night.

 
This app can be used as a standalone product or as an addition to therapy sessions.
 
Good luck with your exams!

title: Bubble Game - Stress Relief
description:
Bubble Game - Stress Relief is a simple anti stress, relax game. This virtual bubble wrap is an excellent stress reliever. It‚Äôs simple. Start the app, press the bubbles with your fingers and make them burst. From now on, whenever you feel the pressure rising, all you have to do is take out your smartphone. Take out your stress on your virtual bubble wrap and relax at the sight of bursting bubbles. 

Bubble Wrap is not only a stress reliever game. You can use your virtual bubble wrap to kill time waiting in line or waiting for an appointment, during a long flight, bus ride, or train ride. 

Important
Before you add your comment/rate the app please read the advice below (click more and scroll down).

New Futures 
We are planning to develop our application by increasing its functionality and adding new futures. If you have new ideas please send them to us via email app@examobile.com or write about it in the comments. We will develop the app accordingly so that it serves you well. 

Report a bug
In case the app doesn‚Äôt work correctly, before you give us low rating, please fill in a short survey at http://examobile.com/bubblewrap/ and report the bug.

We would like to wish you a pleasant time using the app and also invite you to visit our website www.examobile.com and our Facebook Fun Page http://www.facebook.com/ExaMobile 

Attention! In order to make the app work even smoother we advise you to upgrade your Android operating system to the latest version available for your smartphone. This action in most of the cases solves all the problems/issues.

title: Stress Management Techniques
description:
Stress Management Techniques is all about taking charge: of your lifestyle, 
thoughts, emotions, and the way you deal with problems. 
No matter how stressful your life seems, 
there are steps you can take to dealing with stress.

Suffering from stress can be an almighty strain on ourselves both mentally and physically.
Stress management is really important to keep these feelings in check. 

By reading this guide you will get tips on how to relieve stress naturally

Stress Management Techniques Ebook contains:

Introduction
1: Could You be Addicted to Stress?
2: Consequences for Failing to Break Your Stress Addiction
3: Analyze Where Your Stress Stems From
4: Figure Out What You Can Quit Cold Turkey
5: Lifestyle Changes for Less Stress 
6: Replace Bad Stress Habits with Good Ones
7: Interrupting Your Usual Stress Reactions
Conclusion & Learning to Live a Stress-Free Life

Download this app and get free tips on how to relieve stress!

Please, let us know your opinion and suggestions about the guide in order to improve it.
If you are a google+ user and you like the guide, please press 1+ button. 
So you will help us to improve and to create more ebooks. Thank you!!!
If something doesn¬¥t work or if you want to let us know your suggestions, 
please write us an e-mail.

title: Breath Ball: The Stress Relief Breathing Exercise.
description:
5 things to consider before choosing a breathing app:
‚≠êÔ∏è Warning! Many breathing apps instruct you to inhale and exhale at a constant speed. This does not just feel unnatural, it can even cause you to adopt an unhealthy way of breathing, which can lead to health issues. Beware, even some of the most downloaded apps make this mistake!
Breath Ball's breathing is based on clinical observations of hundreds of humans. The app was specifically designed for clinical environments. That's why Breath Balls breathing exercises feel natural and work much better than any of the competing apps.
‚≠êÔ∏è No quackery: Breath Ball is based on sound scientific research. New breathing exercises are added only when there is sufficient research data available.
However, you can of course define your own breathing exercises and use Breath Ball for whatever you want.
‚≠êÔ∏è Maximum customizability: Our well being highly depends on what we like and dislike. Breath Ball is the only app you can fully customize to your liking: Colors, breathing exercises and even the size of the user interface can be adjusted to give you the breathing app that feels just right for you.
‚≠êÔ∏è Focus on simplicity: Breath Ball is incredibly easy to use and even the first breathing session usually leads to great results.
‚≠êÔ∏è Free: Even the free version of Breath Ball provides all the functionality you'll ever need.

These are the main reasons why leading medical professionals, therapists and biofeedback coaches use and recommend Breath Ball.

What is Breath Ball used for?
Breath Ball helps you to relieve stress and anxiety, soothe the symptoms of COPD and Asthma, lower high blood pressure and overcome sleeplessness with four easy breathing exercises. What might sound too simple to be true, is actually based on latest scientific research and is used to treat patients at rehab facilities and in clinical environments. So let's take a closer look at Breath Ball's breathing exercises and what they can do for you:

Breath Ball provides breathing exercises for these four use cases:

‚≠êÔ∏è The cardiac coherence breathing exercise is used to relieve stress and anxiety. It is thought to patients at rehab and bio-feedback trainings to help them get calm and relax.

‚≠êÔ∏è The COPD foundation‚Äôs recommended breathing technique helps to relieve the
symptoms of Asthma and COPD.

‚≠êÔ∏è Slow paced breathing is a complementary treatment against hypertension (high blood pressure). It goes back to Prof. Dr. Loew and is commonly used in clinical environments.

‚≠êÔ∏è Dr. Andrew Weil‚Äôs famous 4:7:8 breathing technique is used to get calm to fall asleep.

Each of these breathing exercises comes with a short tutorial that will get you started in less than two minutes. Beside that you can create your own breathing exercises; something yoga and pranayama coaches enjoy a lot.


Privacy concerns?
Please note: We truly value your privacy. Breath Ball does not collect any of your personal data. There is no Facebook integration and there are no social sharing features included. If you decide to use this app, you do so absolutely anonymous.

Breath Ball is a philanthropic project and you are more than welcome to use it. In case of questions or suggestions feel free to drop as an email at michael@breathball.com

Thanks for reading. Feel free to download Breath Ball now.

It should also provide the option to turn this confirmation off.)

Visual of ball and adjustment of timing is great. But the audio glitches that make a crackling sound every time the audio cue happens makes this app unusable with the sound on. Yes, you can just turn the audio guide off, but the audio guide, without the glitches, would really add to the meditative experience and would allow you to not have to be looking at the ball 100% of the time.

title: HRV Stress Detector
description:
What is this app for?
An app to help everyone to reduce stress with an aided deep breathing video (3 min & 5 min) training, adding the heart rate variability for monitoring the changes before after the training.

Why deep breathing?
Deep breathing or mindful breathing exercises can help us to relax our body, which deep breathing is well known as one of the best ways to lower stress in the body. Every single cycle of deep breathing sends a message to the brain to calm down and relax. When we are engulfing by STRESS, heart rate will increase but if we breath deeply, we are relaxing.

Why using video to guide the deep breathing?
The video shows a flower with appearing of petals (breathing in) and disappearing of petals (breathing out) to aid or accompany one's to do the deep breathing. According to the research study, the suggested deep breathing for 6 full cycle in one minutes is recommended to avoid hyperventilation. Here, the video with appropriate timing for deep breathing is guided. With a wander mind, guided object can help to let us stay focus on it and feeling relax in short duration. User may just observe the appearing and disappearing petals of the smiling flower.

What is heart rate variability (HRV) and why do user is encouraged to do the measurement for before and after the deep breathing training ?
Heart rate variability (HRV) is the physiological phenomenon of variation in the time interval between heartbeats. It is a non invasive tool in stress management with deep breathing. With this app, user needs not to purchase external HRV device to do measurement. You can focus on two aspects, 
1. HRV measurement reliability and repeatability.
2. HRV baseline values.

User may use the HRV baseline values (before training) to compare with the result after deep breathing training. HRV baseline values is relevant in the context of longitudinal changes and comparisons. You need to have a higher HRV, which reflecting your heart achieving a more time constant heart beat rhythm. Anyhow, deeper breaths increase your HRV. This app is enabling user to monitor their HRV reading daily to reduce stress with the guided deep breathing video.Reducing stress can improve people's health according to research study.

Support: Up to Android Kit Kat 4.4 and above

How it works:

1. Registration for new user
2. Login with registered user
3. Select option on answering the Perceived Stress Scale (PSS) to measure the perception of stress.
   a. Measure with Questionnaire 
   b. Measure without Questionnaire
4. Answer questionnaire with the choice of a. and press 'submit'. If selection on b. may proceed to 5. straightaway. 
5. Place your index finger dip gently on the camera window for heart rate variability measurement (HRV) before deep breathing attention training.
6. Wait for 2 short minutes where the time duration is showed on the top right hand corner of the phone.
7. Choose the length of the Deep Breathing attention training (3 minutes or 5 minutes). 
8. Repeat step no. 5 for HRV measurement after the training.
9. Check the Stress Data on History
10. Enjoy HRV Stress Detector


Have fun! May you be well and happy always =)
descriptionHTML:
What is this app for?
An app to help everyone to reduce stress with an aided deep breathing video (3 min & 5 min) training, adding the heart rate variability for monitoring the changes before after the training.

Why deep breathing?
Deep breathing or mindful breathing exercises can help us to relax our body, which deep breathing is well known as one of the best ways to lower stress in the body. Every single cycle of deep breathing sends a message to the brain to calm down and relax. When we are engulfing by STRESS, heart rate will increase but if we breath deeply, we are relaxing.

Why using video to guide the deep breathing?
The video shows a flower with appearing of petals (breathing in) and disappearing of petals (breathing out) to aid or accompany one's to do the deep breathing. According to the research study, the suggested deep breathing for 6 full cycle in one minutes is recommended to avoid hyperventilation. Here, the video with appropriate timing for deep breathing is guided. With a wander mind, guided object can help to let us stay focus on it and feeling relax in short duration. User may just observe the appearing and disappearing petals of the smiling flower.

What is heart rate variability (HRV) and why do user is encouraged to do the measurement for before and after the deep breathing training ?
Heart rate variability (HRV) is the physiological phenomenon of variation in the time interval between heartbeats. It is a non invasive tool in stress management with deep breathing. With this app, user needs not to purchase external HRV device to do measurement. You can focus on two aspects,
1. HRV measurement reliability and repeatability.
2. HRV baseline values.

User may use the HRV baseline values (before training) to compare with the result after deep breathing training. HRV baseline values is relevant in the context of longitudinal changes and comparisons. You need to have a higher HRV, which reflecting your heart achieving a more time constant heart beat rhythm. Anyhow, deeper breaths increase your HRV. This app is enabling user to monitor their HRV reading daily to reduce stress with the guided deep breathing video.Reducing stress can improve people's health according to research study.

Support: Up to Android Kit Kat 4.4 and above

How it works:

1. Registration for new user
2. Login with registered user
3. Select option on answering the Perceived Stress Scale (PSS) to measure the perception of stress.
a. Measure with Questionnaire
b. Measure without Questionnaire
4. Answer questionnaire with the choice of a. and press 'submit'. If selection on b. may proceed to 5. straightaway.
5. Place your index finger dip gently on the camera window for heart rate variability measurement (HRV) before deep breathing attention training.

title: Ease My Stress & Anxiety
description:
Never go to bed with stress again.

Our ancestors had lot of time on their hands and have left behind so many simple yet powerful techniques for us. We just need to follow their footsteps and not try and attempt to re-invent their cycle. I fell into that fast-paced lifestyle and destroyed my health. Diagnosed with diabetes at 32 years old, I had a heart attack due to work related stress. Thats when I decided enough is enough and I need to transform from the inside out. 3 years of intense research and experiments in Yoga led me to these routines which gave my body a chance to repair and reverse all my health issues. I have reversed my diabetes, strengthened my heart and rid my body of medications. When I look back, I remember the stressed and harmful lifestyle I was living and the diseases it created. 
I took Yoga teacher certification and Pranayama Teacher certification from classical gurus (Old-School). 

I am now on a mission to help people get rid of lifestyle diseases, stress and medications. What I am sharing in this app is my daily routine and the fundamentals I practice every day. Stress is the silent killer of our time - leading to heart attacks and preventing us from achieving our health goals thereby triggering even more diseases. A 40-year-old getting heart attacks is becoming common.

Get rid of unwanted stress and get complete control of your body. Never go to bed again with stress and suppression.

1. Prevent Back Pain ‚Äì With countless hours of sitting all day we mess up the natural alignment of our back. This simple routine will help fix the weak areas around the spine and neck and puts back the Spine discs in the natural socket. It will fix your back pain and will be helpful to make you sit straight for Meditation. Studies show that 80+ million Americans are suffering from some form of
back & spine related issues.

2. Release Stress in Upper Back & Neck - Text neck is now a common problem because of regular use of smartphones. Doing these routines will alleviate stress in the upper back and neck and practicing this exercise regularly can help avoid major issues. This chapter will prepare you for the next chapter where you will learn of how to breathe correctly.

3. Fix Breathing - Nourish & Detoxify your body by fixing your breathing ‚Äì to perform optimally, our Brain and Body need sufficient oxygen. This technique is natural way of breathing and we used to breathe this way when we were babies. Stress leads to heavy, shallow breathing which in turn leads to even more stress. Practicing the Deep breathing exercises will help improve breathing and calm down the body. With regular practice, you will feel the oxygen saturating your body. You can‚Äôt meditate if you don‚Äôt know how to breathe correctly. Breathing deeply strengthens the heart.

4. Om Chanting - With Chanting OM, you produce vibrations and stop thoughts flowing through your head and helps in relaxing. It is a type of meditation and with regular practice we produce alpha, theta and delta waves which results in secretion of hormones like Serotonin. Serotonin is a natural mood stabilizer. It‚Äôs the chemical that helps with sleeping, eating, and digesting.

5. Strengthen Lungs/Fire Breathing - Regular practice of this routine will help strengthen lungs and the cardiovascular system without running. This routine will activate millions of air sacs in the lungs.

6. Fix Stress & Depression - Several techniques to de-stress the body. These can be applied
almost anywhere.

7. Remove Suppression ‚Äì learn to release anger and frustration, as long-term suppression will lead to depression and panic attacks.

8. Meditation ‚Äì I will teach you to Tap into your Higher brain(Analytical). With the past 7 weeks of training in relaxation techniques, the final week of Meditation can help you reach your full potential to live a stress-free lifestyle. You will not be running @100 miles per hour on the inside anymore.

title: PIP Stress Tracker
description:
PIP Stress Tracker

Stress Tracker is your personal stress management tracker. Set the session timer and see, in real-time, how your stress levels continuously change. Detailed session results enable you to analyze and improve your ability to de-stress.

Use this app with the Pip - a device that helps you learn to better manage stress. The Pip allows you to visualize your stress levels, teaching you how to recognize stress and control your reaction to it.

Stress Tracker syncs with My Pip ‚Äì your cloud platform for better living. At the end of each session your performance data is uploaded automatically to My Pip where you gain deeper insights into your stress levels and can track and compare performance over time.

comments: There is no way to start any of the Pip apps without registration, why? I do not want to share my personal info or my stats. I'm sure there's a way to make a ‚Ç¨150 gadget work without asking for private stuff you don't need to know Pip people! Not very user friendly.

The app is a tad bit bad, sure it lets you do the main idea behind it easily, but if you need to go back, the back button for Android does nothing.   Connecting to the Pip can go on forever despite having already connected in the background.

I use it to relax when I'm stressed or anxious, to help go to sleep, before exams, during hw breaks, in between long and complicated reading passages or math exercises, before/after working out. These are all great practical applications, because the app allows one to see what actual state of stress they are in and make moves to relax either with breathing exercises/meditating or other means. The app has also useful for spiritual growth. It can strongly supplement prayer/meditation.
I can't get the program PIP to start. I'm not sure if I am placing my finger on the circle the wrong way or if I have to buy another piece.

No way to fine tune sensitivity, no options to exit app or even to back out of session, no indication of how to really apply the data - seems like it might establish a baseline at the beginning of each session, but it's all a mystery - no documentation. Would be nice if it offered some insight, tips, explanations at least of what the app is really charting, or at least a raw data view option (with some sort of numbers and a visceral unit of measurement) so you can really see what it's doing.

title: LO2(Stress Checker)
description:
Stress builds up unknowingly.
Something goes wrong. In such a case.
If you can react early to the signs of imperceptible stress, you may be able to optimize your condition and prevent trouble before it happens.

App's characteristic:
Measure the degree of stress from the heartbeat obtained with your fingertips.
The result can be seen in the graph.
Estimated lines of high stress are displayed on the screen as critical levels. 
(Accumulated data can be a measure of stress.)
The results can be shared on SNS.
It has a customization function that allows you to set your own normal values ‚Äã‚Äãusing your own data. (Customized if certain conditions are met.)

Usage:

First, set the ID and password.
When setting a password, please use at least 8 characters.
Click the button at the top right of the screen to set your profile.
Place your index finger on the other side of the dominant arm against the camera to start measuring.
In about 2 minutes, the result will be displayed.
Degrees of stress will be displayed as a percentage (%). If you are fatigued, some advice will also be displayed.
The result history is displayed in a graph. (Click the graph icon.)
The positions where the stress level is considered to be much higher than the average are indicated as critical levels. As the data accumulates, it will be one indicator of high stress.

To customize, select customize from the icon on the upper right of the result screen, answer the question, and register the data.
If the data meets the conditions, you can set your own normal value

If the measurement is not reliable, the App will display an approximation. Please perform the measurements again according to the instructions.

Notes

The result is sometimes unstable when other applications are open or the cache of this app is full. In such a case, please close all the other applications and clear the app‚Äôs cache. (Go to Settings ‚Üí app ‚Üí LO2(stress checker); and clear the cache). Always measure in a bright room.

Please use mobile phone with flash light.

This app is not designed for medical use, therefore we do not take any responsibility for the action taken based on the result shown by the app. Please follow your doctor‚Äôs instruction in some cases.

title: Antistress: Mind Relaxing Toys
description:
You may not have any control over your teacher's wrath or boss's anger but you may surely have control over you and this antistress relaxing game which can vanish your stress in no time. This mind relaxing stress relief game helps when you are stressed out with whatever reason you have in this fast stressful life. It is inevitable to feel stressed in today's world hence Antistress : Mind Relaxing Toys game is been developed, to cool your mind and to make you feel better. You won't feel good with that anger coming out of you and showering out onto your teacher or boss or parents. will you? Play this anxiety relief and antistress game ad get your cool to handle every situation. If you're upset, pop some popcorn in this antistress toys simulator, you'll feel happy with popping each popcorn. If you're angry, break desktop in this cool anxiety relief and antistress game, your anger will be disappeared with the desktop you broke and you'll feel wonderful. Trust me!

title: STRESS - BALL
description:
If you like accelerometer games, you love STRESS ‚Äì BALL.  Simply tilt your device to get the green ball to the green square.  There are 28 different brain teaser levels and 3 difficulty settings for when you are ready for more of a challenge.  This game incorporates 2D physics and has obstacles with different speeds to navigate around or use to complete the various levels.  Play again to improve your time. No more dying and starting over, there are no traps or abyss to fall into.  There are multiple level types and themes to keep you engaged.  If you need help, there are level tips available to relieve some stress.  I hope you enjoy playing STRESS ‚Äì BALL as much as I did making it.  This game was possible thanks to AndEngine.  Enjoy!



Tester‚Äôs Comments: It is a crazy tilt your phone to get the ball to the goal game but it isn't as easy as it sounds. You have to figure out puzzles, save Blinky and navigate mazes. It has 28 levels with 3 different hardness options and tips that you can enable to help you if you get a little lost.

title: Mindfulness Based  Stress Reduction
description:
GUIDED MEDITATION FOR STRESS: Do you feel overwhelmed on a daily basis? Consider learning about emotional triggers, reasons for holding on to stress, how mindfulness based stress reduction can help overcome feelings of anxiety and depression. This beautiful guide will help you:

‚úì Reduce and release stress
‚úì Encourage stress relief meditation
‚úì Guided Mindfulness meditation
‚úì Help remedy body imbalances and manage stress and anxiety
‚úì Improve mental, physical and emotional health and well-being
‚úì Alleviate insomnia and poor sleeping patterns

Learning about how to reduce stress in our lives will lead to a more healthy emotional and physical lifestyle. It is no coincidence that many top CEOs, Gurus and other business moguls have implemented a regular daily meditation practice into their lives. Taking time to release stress through guided mindfulness meditation leads to increased focus, enhanced productivity, clarity of mind and openness to innovative ideas and creativity.  

Starting on this path will allow you to broaden your mind to this alternative methods and techniques. It will open your mind to boundless possibilities and unlimited creativity of your mind and imagination. 

FREE APP: Our app is completely free to download, and includes hours of free audio meditation and reading guides. Download our free Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction Guide and start centering your body, mind and soul today. Included in our Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction app is some great content to help you reduce your stress and anxiety.

Our informational Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction introduces you to the basics of energy healing. Below is a list of topics you can expect to read about.

* Why You Should Release Stress
* Understanding the Complexity of Your Stress Systems
* How to Manage Normal Stress
* Getting Started with Meditation

GET ON TRACK: Our audio meditations range from 5 ‚Äì 30 minutes making it extremely flexible to fit into any busy schedule. title: Serenita - Stress & Anxiety
descriptionHTML:
Measure and lower your stress in 5 minutes a day.

Serenita‚Ñ¢ is a clinically proven and internationally recognized App for measuring and lowering stress in five minutes a day. In June 2015, Serenita won the prestigious ‚ÄúBest Health App of the Year‚Äù award, given annually by the Doctors 2.0 Organization.

More about Serenita‚Ñ¢:

Serenita‚Ñ¢ by Eco-Fusion is an interactive, science-backed tool, designed to help you monitor & lower your stress anytime & anywhere. By using Serenita for 5 minutes a day, you will feel better, improve your long-term health and reduce the risk of serious illness. By lowering your stress, the app helps you reverse known conditions caused by stress, such as anxiety, weight gain, poor sleep, mild depression, poor focus, and low energy. By monitoring and treating your stress on a daily basis, Serenita‚Ñ¢ provides insight into your stress patterns overtime, and strengthens your stress resilience.

Main Features:

- Stress level monitor;
- Personalized exercise designed to give you the biggest stress reduction per time spent;
- Real-time feedback to make sure you are following the exercise correctly;
- Quantified results that are tracked over time.
- Available 24/7
- Can be performed in a crowded elevator

How It Works:

- Place your index finger over your Phone‚Äôs back camera lens;
- Using advanced digital technology, Serenita‚Ñ¢ analyzes blood flow and variances in heart & breathing rates - to calculate your stress level;
- Follow Serenita‚Äôs personalized breathing routine to immediately reduce your stress; this highly effective exercise, turns on your body‚Äôs natural ‚Äúrelax signal‚Äù, which shuts down the flood of stress hormones & replaces them with relaxation hormones & enzymes.
- See in real-time how your exercise affects your stress level;
- Feel much more relaxed;
- Get your session stats;
- View your historical stress trends and patterns.

Complete this process in just for 5 minutes daily, and feel your stress melt away.

A leader in the field of digital therapeutics, Eco-Fusion offers a drug-free, personalized approach to health-related lifestyle changes. Download Serenita‚Ñ¢ now.
summary: A Clinically validated app that measures and reduces stress in 5 minutes a day.
comments: Very cool tool! Would love to see this program integrated with wearables as getting vital sign readings through the camera is not optimal! Otherwise i think it works really well.
I recomendation this apk can ditect the corona virus .. Try and prove it's true..
Terrible

I loved this app when I had it previously I could do the breathing exercises for free. Now you have to pay $12.99 a month?!?! That is absolutely insane!! It's also very sad because I found it helpful before....
This came across a FB ad at just the right time. This makes me stop, breath, focus and not get another headache.

title: Panic Attack Anxiety Relief: Breathing Exercises
description:
Don‚Äôt Panic!!! This has caused more panic than any other phrase of the language. We present you Panic Attack Anxiety Relief: Breathing Exercises; an app designed to render instant Anxiety Relief and stop the Panic Attack before it gets out of hand.

What is the ladder leading to Panic? According to us it all starts from Stress; Stress is the main cause of distress of the majority of us living in this fast paced world. Stress when accumulated manifests itself into Anxiety and Anxiety has its own set of physical and emotions symptoms. We always seek to treat our anxiety symptoms as they are very disturbing for us and people around us; anxiety symptoms can be; 

‚Ä¢	Increased Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
‚Ä¢	Palpitations
‚Ä¢	Sweating
‚Ä¢	Irrational decision making
‚Ä¢	Chest Pains

And that is still stage one; once these anxiety symptoms are not treated they can mature into an Anxiety Disorder where these anxiety symptoms reappear as anxiety disorder and many other forms and also may get triggered based on certain situations.

Panic Attacks are one form of Anxiety disorder and they can be really daunting for anyone who doesn‚Äôt really understand the root cause. Panic attack symptoms are very similar to anxiety symptoms and they add up the following to the list;

‚Ä¢	Racing heart
‚Ä¢	Numbness of hands
‚Ä¢	Feeling loss of control

Panic Attack symptoms can appear in anyone and in any situation, the underlying anxiety disorder that stemmed from the chronic stress sometimes manifests itself in a very severe form and the person end up in the Emergency room complaining of illness that is not there; all due to Panic attack.

During a Panic Attack the best and worst advice is the same; ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt Panic‚Äù; but to take it further a step we have designed this Panic Attack Anxiety Relief: Breathing Exercises app that renders instant relief from Anxiety and Panic Attacks. The technique used is quite simple; Breathing Exercises, we have utilized the power of breath of bring the calmness and focus back into the person suffering from Panic attack or Anxiety.

The step by step instructions take the focus away from the problems and bring them to the carefully designed Breathing Exercises; with a combination of short, medium and long breaths we have designed the perfect breathing exercise for anxiety relief and panic attacks. These breathing exercises follow the same rule of;

Inhale ‚Äì Hold ‚Äì Exhale ‚Äì Hold ‚Äì Repeat

With an assistive sound and soothing background music these breathing exercises will take the anxiety away control the Panic Attack.

Feedback for these breathing exercises is taken at each activity and next activities are designed based on the user input on the intensity of Anxiety and Panic Attack. We recommend that you keep this Panic Attack Anxiety Relief: Breathing Exercises app with you all the time and in case you feel any anxiety of notice panic attack symptoms approaching just press the button and we will take it from there.

Wellness Labs is focused towards alleviating the lives of everyone around us and Panic Attack Anxiety Relief: Breathing Exercises app is one of our efforts to relax people and take all the anxiety, panic attacks and phobias away from them. We look forward to your feedback and improve our app based on your input.
