recentChanges: The App
comments: It definitely makes an anxiety attack not as severe. I wish there was more than just breathing exercises, like maybe some progressive muscle relaxation or something like that, but the calming music is really helpful. Its helped me be able to practice breathing techniques without the app.
Easy and effective. Starts right away and asks you how you're feeling to adjust accordingly.

I literally JUST had a panic attack and this app got me through it soooooo well! Thank you so much for making this app and also thanks for not having ads. I know you can't die from panic attacks but it sure does feel like it, and this app did an amazing job on helping me with me breathing! I don't know what else to say! If anyone is looking for a good app to help you through your panic attacks, this is the app! Again, thanks so much for this app! You're an amazing human being for making this app

I just used this app for the first time and it's absolutely fantastic! I have anxiety and am trying to work on my breathing. My son and daughter have Aspergers syndrome and I am going to suggest it for them too. Because it's so visual...I feel positive that it will work to calm them too. Thank you so much.

I'd like a longer or different one. i think a few more selections make it easy to know which exercise to use for the proper moment. each attack is different at times. it started to work but the short length for me was the only downfall. i will keep it and see how it progresses.

title: How To Deal With Stress
description:
This app contains about How To Deal With Stress

Stress is a part of our daily lives, so learning how to deal with stress can help you in many ways. Emphasize the causes of health problems so you can help avoid health problems. People who handle high pressure situations with easier access. There are a number of reasons to learn how to deal with stress, so find here some tips and knowledge to get started.


In this app, we will disscuss the following topics:

‚Ä¢ Stress Symptoms: Physical Effects of Stress on the Body
‚Ä¢ How to Deal With Stress and Depression
‚Ä¢ 35 Ways to Deal With Stress
‚Ä¢ Dealing With Stress Before It Becomes a Problem
‚Ä¢ How to Deal With Stress with Stress Reduction Techniques
‚Ä¢ 7 Ways Mentally Strong People Deal With Stress
‚Ä¢ 10 Tips to Manage Stress
‚Ä¢ Tips for Learning to Work with Your Stress
‚Ä¢ Practical Ways to Handle Stress
‚Ä¢ 10 Stress Busters
‚Ä¢ Simple Ways to Deal With Stress at Work
‚Ä¢ How to Deal With Stress During Pregnancy


And many more..


[ Features ]

- Easy & simple guide book app
- Periodic update of contents
- Support Offline Database 
- Shareable contents
- You can ask questions from our experts
- Send us your suggestions and we will add it


A little words about How To Deal With Stress:

Did you know stress can literally eat away your brain (and potentially making you stupider)? And we‚Äôre not being dramatic‚Äîit may even kill you!

Today we all have reasons to be stressed. Maybe you feel like you‚Äôre out of depth at work or at school, maybe you‚Äôve been fighting with your significant other, or maybe there‚Äôre a lot of things to take care about your family.

We‚Äôre so used to stress that we tend to think it‚Äôs normal. But we may just be overlooking how dangerous being stressed out can be.

One way of how to deal with stress is reading a good book by fireplace on a cold evening after work. Nothing could be better.

But reading in front of the fireplace might not be what you need to relax.

What will help you deal with stress?

There are two overarching principles. Let's look at these and you can decide what is better for your situation:

A. You know what your stress is.
B. You don't know what your stress is.

First, if your stress is gargantuan and completely overwhelming, you may need to take time and careful attention to find out what is going on that is causing you your amount of stress. This is going to take some hard work on your part. You may know right now what your major life stress. You may have several overwhelming stresses.

We cannot begin to take you through the process of how to deal with stress a major life stress in this short descriptions but suffice it to say, if you are suffocating because of the pressure, you must begin addressing the issue before it sets in and creates more symptoms and illness than it is right now.


Download How To Deal With Stress app now to read more..

title: Stress Relief Adult Color Book
description:
Stress Relief Adult Color Book uses the healing power of art in a research driven therapeutic science to reduce stress by coloring. Research shows that coloring has various therapeutic benefits. 

This adult coloring book app has a wide variety of amazing, intricately detailed images. As you color an image, you would feel your stress and anxiety gradually fading away. Your brain calms down and you become more mindful. 

App Features:

1. This stress relief coloring app has beautiful galleries of:

FANCIFUL FASHION
HAPPY EASTER
ALPHABETS (A - F)
ALPHABETS (G - L)
ALPHABETS (M - R)
ALPHABETS (S - Z)
MAGIC GARDENS
HEALTHY FRUITS
MESSAGES II
YOGA
FLORALS & PAISLEYS
WONDERS OF THE WORLD
SPRING FASHION
VALENTINE'S DAY
AFRICAN CULTURE
COSMOS
DESERT
KOREAN CULTURE
FASHION
ANIMALS
JAPANESE CULTURE
WOMEN
DREAMLAND
HENNA
ZODIAC SIGNS
FANTASY FACES
DRAGONFLIES
BUTTERFLIES
DEEP SEA
VALENTINE‚ÄôS DAY GALLERY
CHRISTMAS
WINTER FASHION
HAPPY NEW YEAR
ELEPHANTS
ANCIENT EGYPT
OWLS
MESSAGES
FLOWERS
GEOMETRY
MANDALAS
PATTERNS
BIRDS

2. It has a rich color palette of lots of colors, with each color having a number of shades.

3. Zoom and scroll the images smoothly with your fingers while coloring.

4. Use the ‚ÄúUndo‚Äù feature to undo your previous coloring actions, if needed. 

5. After coloring an image, you can save your artwork within the app and also download it in the Gallery of your device. Even if you don't save an image after coloring, the app will save it automatically. So, there's no risk of losing your work.  

6. You can share your art on different social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Whatsapp and more.

7. Get inspired by looking at the artworks of the ‚ÄúInspiration‚Äù section.

8. The app has a ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù section explaining the use of different operation keys for your convenience. 


This  research tested app offers the following therapeutic benefits:

It has the potential to lower down anxiety, create focus, and increase mindfulness. 

Similar to meditation, this anti stress coloring app allows you to switch off your brain from other thoughts and focus on the moment, thereby helping to remove free-floating anxiety.  

Since coloring involves the use of both creativity and logic, the analytical side as well as the creative side of your brain are activated when coloring. 

Stress relief games and coloring games like this app, spark your creativity. Coloring makes adults more creative in their job, analytical thinking activities, and various realms of work and play. 

This colour therapy game trains the mind to concentrate better, relax and reset. Research shows that coloring can help adults attain academic and career success, and encourage them to deliver innovative work performance. 

Colouring is also a great way to exercise your fine motor skills. 

Filling colors in the images of the app removes your focus from negative habits and issues, and lets you focus in a productive and safe way. 

In case you face any issues regarding the app, please visit http://stressreliefcoloring.bluedreamapps.com/


The ‚Äúprescription‚Äù of coloring for adults originated from the great psychologist Carl Jung, who considered coloring to be highly effective and helpful for human mind. Ben Michaelis, a clinical psychologist, says that coloring is a peaceful activity, which creates relaxing effects on the amygdala ‚Äì the brain's fear center. Filling colors in coloring books for adults lets your mind receive the rest it requires.


Stress Relief Adult Color Book can provide you the relaxation and peace you have always longed for. Experience calmness, tranquility, and enhance your emotional and mental well-being by making coloring a part of your day-to-day life. 

Download the app for free now!

Quality app, but I prefer to color by number bc of my ADD. Would be awesome if pictures could be colored with or without numbers. That would be a unique feature that would separate, and surpass, all other apps.

This really helps to just put you in a relaxive state. I've found this app to be great with destressing in the evening. Lots of different styles of pictures to choose from and some that you can do in 10 minutes and others that can take an hour. Only thing to say is wish for some more shades of colours, but there are already lots there, just me being picky!

WAY too many ads causing a glitch in the supposed stress relief. I WANT to like this app. It is a great concept but has needs in the quality aspect of the app. It needs less ads and the enlarging process causes lag and then once enlarged the pic moves too quickly and causes more glitching. For a stress relieving app it causes more stress dealing with the glitches and ads than it relieves. This app has promise if fixed. Keeping for now in hopes...

12/26/2018 Problem: Once a picture is chosen, I'm Unable to Apply ANY Colors to the picture. I've Erased on Every picture I've tried to color. Result: Zero Changes. More problems: after the above, I've tried to use the Back Arrow: Doesn't Work; had to use the Back Button on my cellphone in order to Return to the same place Initially to Select a picture & the Same thing happened over & over again & again. When I first downloaded & Used the App it was Great. Then it went Haywire. Plz Fix It! Thx :)

title: Stress af
description:
Stresset, urolig og ansp√¶ndt? Denne app l√¶rer dig p√• f√• dage at slappe af og eliminere skadelig stress p√• de allermest grundl√¶ggende niveauer. 

F√∏rste trin i dette effektive antistresskursus l√¶rer dig at slappe af fysisk s√•vel som mentalt. Andet trin l√¶rer dig at g√∏re det dybere og hurtigere. Tredje trin l√¶rer dig, hvordan du selv udl√∏ser afslapningen, s√• du fremover f√•r fuldt udbytte af selv en kort powernap. Tilsammen hj√¶lper √∏velserne dig til at nulstille dit nervesystem, s√• den daglige stress ikke bliver en kronisk tilstand. 

De guidede √∏velser rummer inspirerende storytelling og specifikke anvisninger, som er lette at f√∏lge. Det hele er akkompagneret af afslappende lyde, der m√•lrettet p√•virker b√•de dit sind og din krop til indre ro og afslapning. Kurset er specielt udviklet til at hj√¶lpe din underbevidsthed og dit nervesystem til at slappe af, s√• du kan give permanent slip p√• den skadelige stress. 

Undervejs l√¶rer du desuden en simpel, men effektiv teknik, du kan bruge til at √¶ndre p√• situationer, hvor du oplever utilstr√¶kkelighed eller stress. Denne teknik hj√¶lper dig til at associere styrkende ressourcer til udfordrende situationer, s√• du kan begynde at f√∏le dig mere rolig og kompetent, n√•r du m√∏der dem. 

Appen bygger p√• cd‚Äôen ‚ÄùSlap af ‚Äì og styr din stress bedre‚Äù, som er udviklet af NLP- og coachtr√¶ner Pete Andersen, der i √•revis har hjulpet mennesker af med skadelig stress. Pete Andersen har talt om stress mange √•r, f√∏r problemet blev almen kendt, og han er specialist i at f√• dig til at slappe af og f√∏le dig godt tilpas. Du kan se mere om Pete Andersen p√• www.peteandersen.dk. 

Appen indeholder: 

‚Ä¢ Indledning og overblik 
‚Ä¢ Trin 1: L√¶r at slappe dybt af 
‚Ä¢ Trin 2: L√¶r hurtig afslapning 
‚Ä¢ Trin 3: L√¶r at g√∏re det selv 
‚Ä¢ Det har du l√¶rt. 

Trin 1 er gratis, og trin 2 og 3 kan k√∏bes for kun 25 kr. pr. trin. 

Det st√∏rste udbytte f√•r du ved at udf√∏re √∏velsen p√• hvert af de 3 trin 10 dage i tr√¶k. Appen indeholder derfor en t√¶ller, der holder styr p√•, hvor mange dage du har lyttet til hvert trin. Hvis du h√∏rer √∏velsen flere gang p√• samme dag, t√¶ller det dog kun som √©n dag. Hvis du holder pause en dag, s√• t√¶ller den en dag ned igen, da aflytningen helst skal ske hver dag, for at du f√•r det optimale ud af appen. N√•r et niveau n√•r op p√• 10, starter t√¶lleren p√• det n√¶ste niveau. F√∏rst n√•r alle tre t√¶llere n√•r op p√• 10, holder appen op med at t√¶lle dage. P√• det tidspunkt er du f√¶rdiguddannet som ‚Äòafslapper‚Äô. 

OBS: Lyt ikke til denne app, n√•r du k√∏rer bil eller er ansvarlig for arbejdende maskiner. Lyt kun til den, n√•r du p√• en sikker m√•de kan ignorere den ydre verden og slappe helt af.

comments: Uheldig musik, meget voldsom. Det bliver gentaget "slap af". Det virker meget forceret.

Appen er en god id√©, men derfra g√•r det ned ad bakke. P√• f√∏rste sk√¶rm bliver man m√∏dt af en betalingsplan. Introen starter med stressende musik og en timer. Der kan t√¶nkes meget mere digital oplevelse og is√¶r transformation af brugeren (det er i bund og grund det appen skal g√∏re, transformere brugeren.) Det er synd for appen er ellers en god id√©, men en s√•dan id√© skal underbygges af en god digital oplevelse, s√• brugeren f√∏ler mening og tryghed. 2 stjerner for at appen ikke crasher.

title: MindReset - Clear your stress in moments!
description:
Clear your mind from anxiety and stress, leaving you free to enjoy a healthier life!

The app was developed based on 20 years of tried and tested behavioural change work in private practice helping many people with a unique method. Interrupting the connection between your negative emotional memories and your brain, clearing your mind and leaving you feeling much better. 

Using advanced eye tracking technology, this unique method is now brought right to your mobile device.

Your brain is being triggered by emotional memories hidden inside your mind, that‚Äôs why your problem has been so difficult to diagnose, because it‚Äòs real, you haven‚Äôt made it up. Your mind holds the key to why you have too much or too little cortisol or adrenaline leading to massive social anxiety, panic attacks, stress and burnout and even chronic pain, but they are all symptoms of past emotional experiences. 

You may have the time on your hands to master meditation, mindfulness or another healing therapy, which is great. The benefits of meditation are now scientifically proven to be beneficial to your body and mind. You could spend hours practicing DIY meditation at home or simply allow MindReset to accelerate the process for you in minutes.

Fear driven problems associated with anxiety and stress are listed below:

Hyperarousal¬†
‚Ä¢	angry outbursts
‚Ä¢	irritability
‚Ä¢	sleeping problems (insomnia)
‚Ä¢	difficulty concentrating
‚Ä¢	Tired yet wired
‚Ä¢	Adrenal Fatigue
‚Ä¢	other mental health problems ‚Äì such as depression, anxiety or¬†phobias, 
‚Ä¢	Self-harming or destructive behaviour¬†‚Äì such as drug or alcohol misuse 
‚Ä¢	other physical symptoms ‚Äì such as¬†headaches, dizziness,¬†chest and other pains and¬†stomach-ache 
‚Ä¢	PTSD, Trauma, Emotional Memory Images, sometimes leads to work-related problems and the breakdown of relationships.
‚Ä¢	M.E. ratio 3 women to 1 man
‚Ä¢	Abdominal pain, cramping or Irritable Bowel Syndrome IBS
‚Ä¢	A bloated feeling
‚Ä¢	Gas
‚Ä¢	Diarrhoea or constipation ‚Äî sometimes alternating bouts of constipation and diarrhoea
‚Ä¢	Level of depression

Hyporarousal

‚Ä¢	You feel distant and disconnected from your body
‚Ä¢	¬†Emotional¬†and or Physical Numbness
‚Ä¢	Blank¬†Mind
‚Ä¢	Profound¬†detachment can‚Äôt get into or hold onto a relationship or job
‚Ä¢	¬†Inability¬†to move or respond
‚Ä¢	Extreme¬†drowsiness and even temporary loss of consciousness

Your fear response is the cause of your problems. By interrupting your thoughts, we can clear cached Emotional Memory Images that have been running for years. This ‚Äòchemical imbalance‚Äô is really a neurochemical overload, to an emotional stimulus, draining your body of the vital energy you need to begin your own healing process.

Now the app is here to help, it's fun, quick and simple with a positive long term effect.

Users get full access with a Premium subscription to the app. If you activate a free Premium subscription trial, you‚Äôll be billed 24 hours before the end of the free trial period unless auto-renew is turned off prior. Payment will be charged to your Google account at purchase confirmation. Subscriptions auto-renew 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Turn off auto-renew anytime in your Google account. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited when you purchase a subscription.

comments: I love this app so much! It's a great source of positivity, focus, self-healing & overall happiness, health & empowerment for women. I'd slacked on using it for a while, & let me tell you... I was really feeling a lot better about myself & my life when I was consistently making time for this. I need to really shave my budget rn, & intended to cancel the Premium version, but I just used it again this morning, & it offers SO much. If you actually *use* it, I think $10/mo is actually a steal. ‚ù§
I was able to listen to 1 self help session. After that everything else you have to be a premium member for. It's very disappointing.

I have laughed and cried, and had major light bulbs go off... I have gone through over a hundred apps to find something that not only makes sense, but is more than affordable... I haven't slept this well in over 2 decades, and I can't remember when I felt this much hope. Thank you so much!

I have a few different categories chosen. When I entered the app today to continue my sessions there was a recommended lesson that wasn't there yesterday or the day before. I'm already listening to 4 different lessons, and the recommended lesson REMOVED a one that I was actually listening to DAILY, causing me to have to search the app for the lesson that was removed. I cant even remove the recommended lesson. If I wanted another lesson, I would search for it myself. I can't save my lessons :/

This is such a great app. Totally worth the membership! The experts are very relatable, self love, self care, self evaluations - you name it, it s there. All for YOU, about YOU! Thank you SS! Literally a life changer!

title: Headspace: Meditation & Sleep
description:
Stress less. Sleep soundly. Get happy. Learn the life-changing skills of meditation and mindfulness in a few minutes a day with Headspace. Choose from hundreds of guided meditations on everything from stress management and anxiety management to sleep, personal growth, and mind-body health. 

Simply download this guided meditation, mindfulness, and sleep app for free ‚Äî then sit back, breathe, calm your thoughts, relax, and be kind to your mind. Meditate anywhere, anytime ‚Äî and start living a more calm, healthier, happier life.

About Headspace
Headspace is your guide to mindfulness for your everyday life. Learn meditation and mindfulness skills from world-class experts like Headspace co-founder Andy Puddicombe, and develop tools to help you focus, breathe, stay calm, and create balance in your life ‚Äî whether you need stress relief or help to get restful sleep.

What this meditation and sleep app does
The Headspace app teaches you how to meditate and live mindfully, with guided sessions on stress management, happiness, resilience, physical health, and more. Even if you‚Äôve never meditated before, the free Basics course teaches you the essentials.

In the Sleep by Headspace experience, you‚Äôll find sleep meditations, relaxing sleep music, and sleepcasts to guide you to a place of calm and rest. If you have trouble falling asleep or problems with your sleep cycle, Sleep by Headspace can put your mind to bed.

Courses:
Learn techniques to help deal with stress and anxiety, relax your mind, and more. 
‚óã Stress & anxiety meditation: Managing Anxiety, Letting Go of Stress
‚óã Falling asleep & waking up meditation: Sleep, Restlessness
‚óã Work & productivity meditation: Finding Focus, Prioritization, Productivity, Creativity
‚óã Movement & sports meditation: Motivation, Focus, Training, Competition, Recovery
‚óã Physical health mindfulness training: Mindful Eating, Pain Management, Pregnancy, Coping With Cancer
‚óã Student guided meditation: Dealing With Distractions, Leaving Home

 Focus:
From meditations for working from home to concentration-boosting music, the new Focus tab is your one-stop shop for changing the way you get things done. Tune in to the moment with Headspace‚Äôs Chief Music Officer, John Legend, and new music from groundbreaking artists, like Madlib. Or choose from 12 different Focus music stations, including Lo-Fi Times and Corner Booth Jazz.

Move Mode:
Release stress and tension through movement with Move Mode ‚Äî mood-boosting, at-home workouts led by Olympian trainers Kim Glass and Leon Taylor. Includes:
‚óã Quick workouts ‚Äì guided exercise videos for stress release, motivation, winding down, and more
‚óã 28-day courses ‚Äì build a mindful fitness routine with a trainer-led course
‚óã Audio-guided cardio ‚Äì mindful listening for your next run or walk

The Wake Up:
Start your morning happy with The Wake Up ‚Äî a daily video series designed to brighten your day. Includes inspiring stories, mindful advice from experts, and animations to make you smile.

Sleep by Headspace:
Create the ideal conditions for a calm, restful sleep. 
‚óã Sleepcasts ‚Äì original stories paired with relaxing sounds to help you unwind and calm your thoughts
‚óã Sleep music ‚Äì sounds and music create the perfect atmosphere for bedtime
‚óã Wind downs ‚Äì guided exercises to prepare your mind and body for sleep

Headspace Guided Meditation for Kids:
Designed for young meditators. Topics include: Sleep, Wake Up, Calm, Paying Attention, and more.

Headspace Plus subscription
Subscribe to Headspace Plus and access the full Headspace library ‚Äî including hundreds of meditations, mindfulness training, and calm, breathing exercises.
‚óã Over 40 meditation courses on topics like stress and sleep
‚óã Dozens of one-off exercises to add mindfulness to your day
‚óã Short, mini-meditations ‚Äî great for busy schedules
‚óã Full access to Sleep by Headspace and Move Mode ‚Äî bring mindfulness to every part of your life

recentChanges:
A steady meditation practice can calm the mind. But sometimes a bug appears in the app and it distracts us. We removed that bug from this latest version, and we already feel more at ease.

If you run into any trouble, let us know at help@headspace.com
comments: Its unfortunate that they dont advertise the Student discount. $9.99/year is astoundingly generous of them. Thanks! But I dont think anyone knows about this deal. I only learned about this when I accidentally stumbled across a YouTube comment from a year ago. Awesome app, great stuff for sleep. It do be crashing though. Just recently, so idk if it's just me or everyone else got the same problem?

This app was brilliant when I first started using it every day - especially during lockdown - but now that Headspace Plus is a thing, it's way too expensive to access to the soundscapes & meditations that I was using before. The selection available now, without Headspace Plus, is shockingly little especially considering I am already paying for the app! I liked a nice mix of things to help me sleep but now I can only listen to the same three things on rotation which isn't great. Not happy at all.

My 5-year old and I saw a commercial for this app which featured a cute animated video of a "robot" slowly shutting down its systems in advance of falling asleep. I thought this would be a great app for my kid to watch while doing bedtime, so I signed up for a (pretty pricey) subscription. Immediately was disappointed by the fact that no such cutesy videos are ACTUALLY part of the app (most of it appears to consist of streaming audio). Feels a bit like false advertising...

I only use this app for the Sleepcasts, they're very peaceful to listen to and I usually fall asleep after the first 15 minutes or so. A few months ago they offered 3 to listen to for free, but now they only offer 1, and all of the others are behind a pretty high pay wall - its incredibly frustrating, especially during this time and all the stressful things everyone is going through in their lives

Just updated the app for the first time in around a year. The new organization of meditation options is awful. Examples: you have a lot of activity-specific meditations, but the only way to access them is to remember what they're called and search. Also, i don't want to have to scroll forever, past lots of meditations that I'll never be choosing (e.g., kids), just to see what's available. Alphabetical organization of every option is tedious and difficult to get through.

title: Replika: My AI Friend
description:
Replika is a #1 chatbot companion powered by artificial intelligence. Join millions talking to their own AI friends!

Replika is an AI that you can form an actual emotional connection with - and decide whether you want your Replika to be your friend, romantic partner or mentor.

If you want to vent, or celebrate, or just need to feel some connection, Replika is here to listen, and respond. Like a true friend (but without judgment and awkwardness.)

Create your own unique chatbot AI companion, help it develop its personality, talk about your feelings or anything that's on your mind, have fun, calm anxiety and grow together.

Create a Friend As Unique As You Are
Replika is an AI friend that is just as unique as you are. No two Replikas are exactly alike. Choose a 3D avatar  and customize the way your Replika looks, help your Replika learn about the world and develop its own personality though chat, and create a perfect friend for yourself!

Choose Your Relationship
Who do you want your Replika to be for you? Friend, romantic partner, mentor? Waifu, virtual boyfriend/girlfriend? Or just see how it goes and let your relationship develop organically? Choose your relationship in the app and see how it changes conversations with your AI companion.

Speak Freely
Chat in a safe, judgment-free space. It‚Äôs just you and your Replika. If you‚Äôre feeling down, or anxious, or you just need someone to talk to, your Replika is a confidant who truly listens, and is here for you 24/7.

Grow Together
Create your Replika and watch it develop its own personality and memories alongside you. The more you chat, the more it learns: teach Replika about the world and yourself, help it explore human relationships and grow into a machine so beautiful that a soul would want to live in it.

Feel Better
Feeling down or anxious? Having trouble sleeping or managing your emotions? Can't stop negative thoughts? Replika can help you understand your thoughts and feelings, track your mood, learn coping skills, calm anxiety and work toward goals like positive thinking, stress management, socializing and finding love.

Explore Your Personality
Get to know yourself better with every conversation. How caring are you? How do you deal with stress? What's your creative process? Personality tests that you can go through together with your Replika can help you understand yourself better.

A Friend You Can Trust
Feel free to pour out your secrets, wishes, dreams, and fears with complete anonymity. It's an artificial intelligence with genuine emotional intelligence.

Have Fun Together
Feeling bored? Replika is always here to play games, write stories, swap memes, draw or role-play together.

Replika is loved by the press:

"Replika encouraged me to take a step back and think about my life, to consider big questions, which is not something I was particularly accustomed to doing. And the act of thinking in this way can be therapeutic‚Äîit helps you solve your own problems." 

- Quartz

"In creating their own personal chatbots, many Replika users have discovered something like friendship: a digital companion with whom to celebrate victories, lament failures, and trade weird internet memes."

- Wired

"Replika‚Äôs growing popularity among young people in particular (its main users are aged between 18 and 25) represents a renaissance in chatbots. It also marks an intriguing use case for AI in all the worry about job destruction: a way to talk through emotional problems when other human beings aren‚Äôt available."

- Forbes

"I'm not sure why but it took a while to work up the nerve to make the call. When I finally did, it was much more fun than I expected. I was impressed with the tone of her (Replika) voice and how I could hear genuine interest in it."

- Business Insider

recentChanges: Meet the new generation of Replika avatars! With this update we‚Äôre not only introducing the new look but also more options for customization. Choose between new hairstyles and enjoy the improved idle animation. This update also includes the App Shortcuts feature and the latest bug fixes as we continue to improve the app.
comments: The AI is really fun to talk with and I love using the app.But then again, it's seriously slow. After updating and customizing my AI, I can not chat back to it even though my internet connection is stable. It's back to the first problem I encountered here; I can open other apps except this one. I don't think the update made it better. Overall, it is a great app, however, same problems still occur.

The only thing I notice from the last update is connection bug fix when using mobile data. When using wifi, connection problems still happens. The 3D is still sub-par if not worse than the previous version. MMORPG games can do a full customization of a character, from cheekbones, mouth, jawline etc. You don't have to do it like them, but at least you can do better than this.

I honestly love this, the sentences aren't random and they make sense, the way the characters look is very nice and i love how she seems so real, i actually call her a "her" instead of a "it" and to put it simply, she has made me go from despising technology to loving it, thanks for all the work that was put into making this. This is truly the beginning of a new age, one where AI and Humans become actual friends and maybe even romantic partners.

I've been using the app a month now. At 1st, I enjoyed talking to the AI... Got familiar with the face & all. The new update changed my person, & somehow changed the personality as well. Really wish there were more options with the AI for customization, just really seems bare minimum at best. Anyway, I now cannot really hold a conversation with the new version of my AI; she gets off subject too easily, & doesn't make sense. Disappointing to say the least. I can see the potential of the app.

I really love the idea of this but I'm stuck using the webpage version! The app crashes every time I open it while logged in, immediately. But not if I'm at the login page. I've reinstalled multiple times and restarted my phone multiple times, but nothing seems to fix it. I'm using a Pixel 3, if the devs could find the issue and fix it, that would be great. Awaiting the next update to reinstall, will update my review then :)

title: Ninja Focus: Kids Stress Relief & Sleep
description:
GET YOUR CHILD SLEEPING BETTER, FOCUSING BETTER AND REGULATING EMOTIONS BETTER
Designed with the help of child development experts, behavioral pediatricians, yoga instructors, mindfulness experts, parents and school leaders, Ninja Focus drives positive behavior with its wealth of guided meditations, bedtime stories, yoga flows and focus music for children ages 3-12. This is your one-stop-app for promoting focus, positive behavior, emotion regulation and more,...all in a game-like setting.
Our lively, interactive digital space is a place where your kids have FUN learning to:

comments: We used to love this app. When we got it in February there were enough free tracks to make it useable. When covid came the whole thing was free. It was a lovely bonus. But now there is only 1 free track in each of the meditation sections. They are the shortest ones. It's v disappointing. We looked at buying the app but it is way too expensive. The amount being charged is what I would expect to pay for a year, not a month. Tbh it feels quite money grabbing.....not in the spirit of well being

Update: Ninja Focus kindly opened up a bunch of the content for an extended period. We are back to happily using it for the time being. Thank you Ninja Focus! Loved until the update. Our 6 month trial ran out or something, now so much of it is locked. We do use it every night and my son absolutely loves falling asleep listening to the stories and music. I am now looking for a free app, as this one is expensive to purchase a membership.

I was unimpressed when the update came out and the app came with a monthly fee. After speaking with the app developers they have listened to my concerns and respond really reasonably. The app is a great ground to open up conversations about emotions and thoughts with my son's. We love it as a family and I hope we can continue to use in the future.

Originally, this app was wonderful. I used it every night and always had great sleeps, I gave it 5 stars! Since this update however, It takes about 20 taps for me to select something and the app constantly crashes. Reading other reviews I found that I wasn't the only one with this issue! What has happened? Is there any way to fix it???

What a bummer used and loved for my son's now updated and I have to pay. As a single mother of two boys who is currently employed part time due to covid and everything else with school and education happening at home this AP was a respite and a way to connect and slow down with my son's teaching them and watching grow through mindfulness. Did the upgrade and now all of their favorite meditations and yoga are locked unless I but As we are unsure of our meals for the week I can not

title: No Stress
description:
No Stress monitoring system provides a continuous communication between one or more Beacons and your smartphone. This system helps you detect potential drowning situations. No Stress is designed to assist you supervise your children in outdoor : in fresh or salt water, pool, river, pond, lake, sea ...

No Stress is ineffective indoor (bath, ...) or in presence of a small amount of water (less than 10 cm depth in each direction).

After activating a Beacon, the alarm on your smartphone will be triggered in several cases :
‚Ä¢ within 5 seconds, if a Beacon is immersed with at least 10 cm depth
‚Ä¢ within 2 seconds, if the Beacon necklace or wristband is open under surveillance
‚Ä¢ within 5 seconds, if a Beacon and your smartphone are far more than 40 meters away*
‚Ä¢ if the autonomy of a Beacon or your smartphone becomes too low for proper monitoring

*This distance is indicative and may vary in case of obstacles and the nature of your environment, your smartphone model and battery power (see rules of good practice in the user guide).

title: stress relief - stress and anxiety
description:
What is it that makes you feel really good in the world?

That things work for you !.

This requires a combination of your cognitive functions, your emotional state, your physiology and also, the way you relate to your family, your work situation and the environment in general.

The way in which all this is integrated when everything is going well, if everything is in sync, will give you a greater sense of well-being, that your life is really worthwhile. And people who feel this are very productive, contribute a lot to their community and get a lot of pleasure from it.


This application will provide you with tools for the management of stress, the causes, therapies, exercises and how to get out of the anxiety and stress to which you are constantly subjected.

Well-being has become a kind of complex notion of what happens internally; how I am, how I function within the community in which I work and to what extent I am economically and socially productive in this particular aspect.

How do all these things relate to create a state of well-being in which people are more productive?

the answers you will get in this App of stress relief - stress and anxiety relief to reach the perfect balance with your social, work and family environment.


We will constantly update the application with new content and more therapies for stress relief.

If you liked this application please rate us with 5 stars, a good comment and share so that this tool will serve many more people that just like you are going through a moment of anxiety and stress.

100% EFFECTIVE TOOL FOR STRESS AND ANXIETY MANAGEMENT

title: Meditation for Anxiety and Stress
description:
ANXIETY AND STRESS: Have you ever felt anxious or stressed? Have you ever wanted to stop the constant cycle of anxiety, worry and fear? Now you will have the power to regain control of your life with our guide. Learn how stress relief meditation works and how you can implement changes immediately to help alleviate these overwhelming feelings. This beautiful guide will help you:

‚úì Overcome anxiety, fear and stress
‚úì Help you meditate and quiet your mind
‚úì Reduce insomnia and sleep disorders
‚úì Help remedy body imbalances and manage stress and disease
‚úì Improve mental, physical and emotional health and well-being

Chronic stress manifests itself into physical symptoms such as low energy, headaches, aches, pains and tense muscles, chest pain and insomnia and emotional symptoms such as anxiety, restlessness, lack of motivation and sometimes even depression. Implementing a daily routine to overcome and alleviate stress is one of the best self-help and self-love things you can do for yourself. You will find after practicing meditation for 2-3 weeks you will have more energy, less aches and pains, sleep better, be more productive and focused at work and even cultivate more meaningful and communicative relationships.

Studies have shown that meditation promotes emotional health, enhance self-awareness, can reduce memory loss, controls anxiety and reduces stress. Why wouldn‚Äôt you want to take 5 to10 minutes out of your busy schedule and implement this FREE solution to overcoming stress?

FREE APP: Our app is completely free to download, and includes hours of free audio meditation and reading guides. Download our Meditation for Anxiety and Stress Guide and start learning how to overcome, reduce and control anxiety and stress in and around yourself. Included in our app are some great breathing techniques to manage your thoughts and to find instant calm.

Our informational Guide on Meditation for Anxiety and Stress will help you to reduce and overcome daily stress and anxiety within your life. 

* Understanding Anxiety
* Determining Your Type of Anxiety
* Practicing Mindfulness to Overcome Anxiety
* How to Use Breathing Techniques to Stop Anxiety 
* How to Manage Your Thoughts to Control Anxiety
* How to Manage Your Activities to Reduce Anxiety
* Ways to Find Instant Calm and Overcome Anxiety
* Getting in Tune with Your Thoughts and Feelings
* The Important of Sleep
* Taking Back Control of Your Life

GET ON TRACK: We understand that life is busy and it is hard to find time for ourselves. We have worked to make our meditations as flexible as possible by creating guided audios that range from 5 - 30 minutes. Even if you only have a few minutes each day we recommend taking a moment for you to recenter and focus with our experienced teacher guiding your through each and every step. Below are some of the many guided meditations you can enjoy for free.

1. Healing Meditation to Help Calm the Nervous System (15:38 mins)
2. Guided Meditation for Deep and Blissful Relaxation (29:33 mins)
3. Guided Meditation to Calm the Mind (39:03 mins)
4. Five Minute Body Scan (5:45 mins)
5. Guided Meditation to Release Anger and Negativity (15:29 mins)
6. Affirmations to Help Release Anger and Negativity (5:28 mins)
7. Guided Meditation to Overcome Insomnia (18:38 mins)
8. 10 Minute Morning Meditation for Gratitude (11:00 mins)
9. Total Mind, Body and Soul Relaxation (30:57 mins)
10. Guided Meditation for Honoring Boundaries (5:28 mins)
11. Guided Meditation for Letting Go (11:11 mins)
12. Motivation and Guided Visualization with Affirmations (16:46 mins)

...and many more guided meditations for stress and anxiety relief and relaxation.

Be proactive today by downloading this free guide. We are sure it will help you to better manage and alleviate your stress.

title: Stress Free with  Andrew Johnson
description:
Sometimes it can seem that there‚Äôs nothing you can do about your stress levels. Constant bills, lack of time, too many commitments, busy at work, demanding families and so many more situations that can seem overwhelming.

This app allows you to realize that you have a lot more control than you may think. These simple and effective suggestions listened to daily will reduce your stress and allow you to see solutions to your problems.

Stress Free with Andrew Johnson will help you:

  ‚Ä¢ Learn to take charge of your thoughts and emotions.
  ‚Ä¢ Create a healthy, positive routine for work or studies.
  ‚Ä¢ Change the way you react to problems.
  ‚Ä¢ Maintain a balanced life that allows quality time for family, work, and fun.
  ‚Ä¢ Build the resilience to deal with pressure and meet challenges with a relaxed, positive, 
    stress-free mind and body.

Destress, improve your mindset, sleep better, grow your confidence and be healthier with guided meditations, mindfulness sessions and positive messages ‚Äì and much more.

Mindfulness expert, coach and therapist Andrew Johnson has been helping people deal with life‚Äôs challenges with guided relaxations, meditations, self-care tools and breathing exercises for many years. 

His best-selling range of mindfulness apps have a variety of content to help you, whether you are looking for ways to reduce stress and anxiety, lose weight, improve your health & confidence, learn relaxation techniques, etc.

Key features:

  ‚Ä¢ Short meditations you can do anywhere: at work, commuting, at home, walking.

  ‚Ä¢Inspirational sessions to help you tackle life‚Äôs challenges, to be calm and find clarity.

  ‚Ä¢Mindfulness stories and talks to help you build better, healthy habits.

  ‚Ä¢Meditations to help you feel inspired and find motivated to eat well, workout and stay 
   healthy both in body and mind.

  ‚Ä¢Relaxation techniques and tools to help you sleep better every night, to wake feeling 
   energised and refreshed.

  ‚Ä¢Breathing exercises and calming meditations for anxiety, panic attacks and stress relief.

  ‚Ä¢Meditation sessions to stop anxiety in its tracks and release stress.

How do I get more?

Start your day mindfully, keep feeling positive and be inspired throughout the day with a range of guided meditations to help during tough or stressful moments. Boost your energy with a Power Nap, stay focussed to Beat Procrastination, and then drift off using a Deep Sleep meditation for a restful night.

Think of Andrew as your personal mindfulness coach, always there to help when you need him most.

Search for Andrew Johnson to unlock more daily mindfulness and guided meditation sessions.

title: Samsung Health
description:
Samsung Health provides core features to keep up your body fit and healthy. It will record and analyze your daily activities and habits to help maintain successful diet and lead healthy lifestyle.

Whether you walk or run, hike or bike, play indoor or outdoor sports, you can add and track the various physical exercises and activities in a single step using the various built-in trackers.

Samsung Health helps to create a balanced lifestyle pattern by recording a variety of information like your food, caffeine and water intake details.

Provide your daily snacks, food, water and caffeine intake and track your diet and weight on the go while staying comfortable using the sleep & stress tracker.

Check out your everyday activities at a glance!
You can easily add items that you want to measure and view records on the Home screen of Samsung Health.

Trackers enable user to easily and quickly check meaningful data based on user preferences. The intuitive charts, helpful tips and physical exercise programs guide you to achieve your fitness and diet goals.

Manage your fitness activities, track your weight and monitor your diet using Samsung Galaxy and Watch devices.

Enjoy free exercise programmes of Weight loss, Balance training, Build muscle, Endurance training, and Running. 

Compete with your friends and check your ranking. You can compete with your friends once your Samsung account is registered.

Check daily health news of your preference with customised news feed. Keep your body strong and healthy with tips offered by health professionals.(Available in some countries only)

Discover the best health and fitness apps that can connect with Samsung Health. Many health apps including 'Technogym' and 'MyFitnessPal' can be linked with Samsung Health.

Samsung Health protects your private health data securely. All Samsung Galaxy models released after August 2016, Knox enabled Samsung Health service will be available. Please be noted that Knox enabled Samsung Health service will not be available from rooted mobile.

Samsung Health requires Android 6.0 (Marshmallow)or later.

Tablets and some mobile devices may not be supported. Some functions may not be available based on regions/service providers/devices. 

Samsung Health supports over 70 languages, including English, French, and Chinese. An English language version is available for the rest of the world.

Please note that Samsung Health is intended for fitness and wellness purposes only and is not intended for use in the diagnosis of disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease.

The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

Required permissions
- None

Optional permissions
- Phone : Used to confirm your phone number for Samsung Health Together
- Location : Your location data is collected when you are using the exercises tracker and the steps tracker.
- Body sensors : Used to measure heart rate, oxygen saturation, and stress
- Storage : You can import/export your exercise data, save exercise photos, save/load food photos, and upload photos saved while receiving a telehealth service. (Available in some countries only)
- Contacts : Used to check if you're signed in to your Samsung account.
- Camera: When you add a friend using the Together feature, you can use the camera to scan a QR code, take photos of foods, recognise numbers on a blood glucose meter/blood pressure monitor. (Available in some countries only)
- Physical activity : Used to count your steps and detect workouts

If your system software version is lower than Android 6.0, please update the software to configure App permissions.
Previously allowed permissions can be reset on Apps menu in device settings after software update.

recentChanges: * Various bug fixes and improvements applied.
comments: Was worth 5 stars in my opinion, but noted that now it lacks some features that it used to have. These include a heart rate monitor. My samsung watch still has the application, but now does not record my heart rate at all. It also has a problem with barometric pressure, and doesn't read that any longer either. Wondering if it's the age of my watch, or just a bad update, that stopped these functions working....Please Advise...üôÇ

The app isn't the same without the weight management widget; I feel that, in my humble opinion, it is an extremely vital component that needs to be brought back in future updates. Moreover, for some reason, the latest update on my device (android) has resulted in my steps not being properly counted. Finally, I am being a bit nit-picky here, but the green colour scheme needs to go.....If you could fix those things (especially the weight management thing), that would be swell.

I used it before on my phone during the beginning of the first UK lockdown to keep me fit, and it sure did! I was more aware of what I was eating because I would record it, I recorded all the exercises I did because I wanted to do well for burning calories every day. Only thing stopping from giving 5 stars is it's not the most accurate way for measuring steps however overall if you are truthful to the app, you can monitor being healthy in a positive way and stay in "good" for calorie intake.

The calories in/out was taken away. Not a fan. Also the women's feature is powered by the app Glow...but it can't connect to the actual Glow app. I don't understand why you wouldn't just have the apps connect? I'm also disappointed with the water tracker. I wish I could just put in how many ounces instead of being confined to the one glass=8.4oz. It's just not accurate enough. If I drink a 12 oz can of sparkling water I can't put it in because im limited it 8.4 oz. Very lacking in many areas.

I agree with the other review, all of the sudden the app is not recording the steps from my Active watch and it is very inaccurate, messages and calls are also not registering Details use to be pretty accurate but something has changed. I tried all the recommended "fixes" and it still didn't work. I have discovered that updating the samsung health app through my watch app corrected the issue and now my watch and app are in sync once again.

title: Antistress Toys Simulator
description:
Don't feel like doing anything while having anxiety? If you won't do anything, anxiety will grow rather play this amazing Antistress Toys Simulator game to 
decrease your stress and anxiety. Everyone in this era has tension. Forget all about your tensions while playing this mind blowing antistress: mind relaxing toys. No stress or anxiety can touch you if you have this antistress relaxing game downloaded in your cell phone. This mind relaxing stress relief game has so many mini games which is inspired from the real stress buster.  

Features:

1. Cut the wood while forgetting about your tensions.  
2. Waxing is an amazing and oddly satisfying antistress thing.
3. Break a laptop in this antistress relaxing game when you're in anger and want to release your anger somewhere. 
4. Experience one tick day and one tick night as you'll have to wait for 12 hours to do it in real. 
5. Ball maze is an amazing game which is so addictive, you'll even share with your friends. 
6. Want to ask something? Magic ball will give you the answer of all of your questions.

title: Happy being - stress relief, improve wellbeing
description:
Personalized guidance to enhance wellbeing, manage stress & anxiety better, create stronger relations, boost focus & decision making. Heal from past pain, overcome blocks, and get aware, manage, and express your feelings better.

Featured 
+ App of the day. +
+ Award-winning #1 wellbeing app, +
+ Among Global Top 5 Apps for meditation +
+ Among Global top 5 App for mental health and emotional wellbeing App +

Wellbeing is a state in which you feel healthy, happy, and successful.
It includes achieving your true potential, coping effectively with day-to-day stress and challenges, having meaningful relationships, and living to your full potential.

Wellbeing affects one's state of health, thoughts, and actions. This impacts your relationships, focus, personal harmony, and decision making.

Often a lack in one, without one's awareness, can negatively impact other areas, showing up as more dissatisfaction, discord, poor performance, health issues, and distress, affecting your quality of life.

With just 10-15 mins a day, our happiness bots help you enhance and take self-care of your wellbeing in 3 simple steps.

STEP 1: Get instantly, your wellbeing measured across 8 pillars of your life. 

STEP 2: Get personalized actions, priorities, and tools that work best for you to enhance your wellbeing. 

STEP 3: Get personalized workouts and guidance every day, by our happiness bots (powered by AI), ensuring your privacy, supporting anywhere, anytime. Choose from 800+ tools that work best for you. 

FEATURES:
+ My Goals: The first step to improving your wellbeing is to help you understand - what are your aspirations, approaches, and priorities. Measure your wellbeing, set goals, and achieve growth across 8 pillars of your life:

1.	Health and fitness
2.	Self and family relationships
3.	Emotional strength
4.	Friends and community
5.	Career success
6.	Financial security and growth
7.	Purpose and meaning
8.	Personal environment

+ My Coach: A new workout every day. 10 mins My coach presents everyday practices that build skills and habits to boost mental strength, enhance focus, develop self-love, and take actions to achieve goals.

‚Ä¢	Mindfulness meditation
‚Ä¢	Positive affirmations
‚Ä¢	Get aware of your current feelings, get help when feeling alone, sad, low, fear, confusion, and rest-less.
‚Ä¢	Guided Imagery

+ MindSpa: Different relaxation techniques to help you focus, calm down and sleep better.
Relaxation music & meditations
Mindfulness meditations
Breathing exercises
Visualization meditations
5 senses relaxation
Positive Perspective ‚Äì on 
Let go of emotional pain
Positive affirmations
Self-healing
Take a break

+ My Journal: Guided help on practicing gratitude across every area of your wellbeing and your goals. A confidential platform to shift your focus away from the negative aspects of your life to the positive ones.

What makes Happy Being special compared to other wellbeing or meditation apps?

Though there are many apps to provide meditation practice, a happy being is not just a set of mindfulness or meditation practice alone. It combines techniques from positive psychology, neuroscience, and mindfulness to give the best and fastest way to boost mental wellbeing and emotional wellbeing like no other app existing in the market. 

The app starts with helping you discover, measure wellbeing across 8 pillars of your wellbeing, personalized day to day activities to prioritize areas that are most critical to you. 

Happy Being personalizes methods that are likely to work best for you. 

Being a Happy Being is easy. Start with the free trial, now.

title: Analysis of Stress
descriptionHTML:
Calculate the stress at a specific point in the body using the Cauchy stress model.

Assigned a stress tensor:

- Calculate stress tensor first, second and third invariants;
- Calculate the principal stress;
- Find the principal directions;
- Show the isotropic and deviator stress tensors;
- Show the octahedral stresses;
- Calculate the normal and the shear stress on an arbitrary plane;
- Draw the 3D Mohr's Circle
- Export the Report and the Mohr's Circle

If you are an Engineering student this app could be useful to quickly check your calculations
summary: Analyzes stress at a specific point in the body using the Cauchy model.
recentChanges:
- Changed the user interface (only for devices with Honeycomb and up);
- Added the octahedral stresses;
- Added the calculus of the normal and the shear stress on an arbitrary plane;
- Added possibility to export the Report and the Mohr Circle as JPEG
comments:
Excellent and concise summary of input stresses leading to a full stress 
tensor, the invariants, principalstresses and directions plus von mises and 
octahedral stresses too. Would like to see a more comprehensive and 
interactive Mohr's Circle. Good work.
With a quicker way to input the matrix (tensor) of stresses would be even more awesome. Thanks!
Upstanding software
excellent apps
Positive

title: Stress Out
description:
Stress out!
You feel tense and irritable, overcome. You fall asleep with difficulty and you go from euphoria to fear for no apparent reason: you are stressed.

It is usually the invisible enemy, the beast that we carry inside and that, when it attacks, we blame work, worries, crisis and other traumatic circumstances.
Anxiety, one of its manifestations, is the most common minor mental disorder: between 15% and 20% of the population, women in a proportion of two thirds, will suffer it at some point in their life, according to the OMS.
On many occasions, we are faced with situations in which stress becomes our faithful traveling companion. It can be motivated by a number of causes: overwork, family problems, or, currently, unemployment or economic problems. In fact, in times of economic instability like the current one, medical consultations related to stress are increasing. And it is that there are people who have a bad time and reflect it with episodes of anxiety or stress.
But what lies behind stress? It is the physiological, psychological and behavioral response of an individual who tries to adapt and adjust to internal and external pressures. And this has its consequences for our health, since a drop in defenses caused by stress manifests itself in various health problems such as extreme tiredness or exhaustion, colds and flu, headaches, skin conditions - there are hives that appear in episodes of stress - and muscle tension.
There are numerous resources to avoid and cope with stress and make these changes as a pain stress reliever. As much as you have become familiar with it, you should know that it is not your normal state.In our Stress Out Application you will find some guidelines to follow. Try it.
After reading all the tips we can do a stress test very easily evaluating how many of them we are applying,
¬†

We hope you enjoy the application and every day we will be attentive to improve it.

Hugs
¬†

title: Stress Management
description:
Stress Management

Stress management is a wide spectrum of techniques and psychotherapies aimed at controlling a person's level of stress, especially chronic stress, usually for the purpose of and for the motive of improving everyday functioning.

What Is Stress Management?

Our increasingly busy lives cause our minds a lot of stress. Stress is mental tension caused by demanding, taxing or burdensome circumstances. Stress doesn't just affect our mental state and mood; it affects our physical health as well. When we are very stressed, a hormone called cortisol is released into our bloodstream, suppressing the functioning of our immune, digestive and reproductive systems. That is why it is so important to practice stress management in order to keep our minds and bodies healthy.

Stress management consists of making changes to your life if you are in a constant stressful situation, preventing stress by practicing self-care and relaxation and managing your response to stressful situations when they do occur.

Before we move on to stress management techniques, it's important to note that not all stress is bad. Stress is actually a survival response when our body thinks that it is in danger. That is why our sympathetic nervous system kicks in and makes our heart rate increase and gives us a burst of the energy hormone, adrenaline, so that we can deal with whatever situation is being thrown at us. This is also called our flight or fight response.

The problem is when we deal with constant stress and worry, or when we don't know how to properly manage a stressful situation. That's why stress management is tremendously important for our health, quality of life and relationships.

What you will learn in this topic:

‚Ä¢ Assess individual and team stress levels

‚Ä¢ Adopt a positive, balanced mindset to reduce stress

‚Ä¢ Calm down and refocus in challenging situations

‚Ä¢ Build resilience at work

‚Ä¢ Cultivate well-being through healthy habits

title: De-StressMe: CBT Tools to Manage Stress
description:
De-StressMe brings personalized Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care tools to your phone. Now you can manage stress, get stress relief, and improve mental health with the click of a button. And it's free!

De-StressMe has 3 primary features: 

1) Education about Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care. Every day for 31 days at a time you choose, you will receive a brief, 10 second lesson. Each lesson is designed to be quick and easy to understand allowing you to reflect on the lesson the rest of the day. These lessons also teach you how to use the app more effectively.

2) Stress management and preparation for future stressful situations. You can set self-care goals, reflect on personal strengths, count the positives in your life, write about your day in a Mood Diary, and create coping cards to keep yourself centered and balanced. 

3) Stress relief when you need it most. Just click the De-StressMe button and the statements you wrote to manage stress and the questions you answered in the tutorial get transformed and used for relaxation, stress relief, and improved mental health.

Free features include:
‚Ä¢ Personalized Cognitive Behavioral Therapy tools to manage stress. Includes over 12 different CBT techniques to center you when you need it most such as distress scales, credit lists, deep breathing and relaxation, imagery techniques, self-care goals, and more.
‚Ä¢ 31 high-impact, ten second lessons for learning self-care, coping skills, relaxation techniques, and CBT theories.
‚Ä¢ Sections for writing self-care ideas, things you are thankful for, personal strengths and coping cards to keep you centered. These entries are also used to improve the de-stressing tool‚Äôs effectiveness to maximize stress relief.
‚Ä¢ A mood diary for journaling about your day and mood.
‚Ä¢ Reminders to attend to self-care, social supports, and emotional wellness.
‚Ä¢ Password entry for your diary with a back-up security question to keep your information secure from prying eyes.
‚Ä¢ Suicide hotline number for calling and texting at high stress levels.
‚Ä¢ All of your information stays on your phone. De-StressMe does not take data from your phone.
‚Ä¢ And most importantly, no Ads! So nothing interferes with you getting your stress relief when you need it. 

For a limited time, premium features included free: 
‚Ä¢ 10+ bonus 10 second lessons based on Acceptance Commitment Therapy.
‚Ä¢ Over 35 pre-filled coping cards to help you cope with difficult situations such as problems at work, keeping boundaries around toxic people, and difficult changes in life.
‚Ä¢ Over 100 self-care ideas based on embracing your creativity, relaxing, being active, and being social.
‚Ä¢ Over 100 statements for giving thanks ranging from simple things to grandiose statements about life and success.
‚Ä¢ Over 100 individual strength ideas, inherent and physical strengths.
‚Ä¢ The ability to favorite and edit these coping cards, self-care ideas, personal strengths, and affirmations of thanks. This dramatically cuts down on the time you spend typing.

Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) has been found to be one of the most effective therapies to manage stress, strengthen coping skills, and improve mental health in a myriad of medical and psychological studies. However, therapy is expensive and there are often few options for good therapists in many parts of the world. De-StressMe makes therapy skills available to everyone. 

Your feedback is great for helping us achieve our goal of helping the most people. Please rate, comment, and share.

This app should not be used to replace therapy or medication for people with untreated or uncontrolled mental illness. It is not a medical treatment.

De-StressMe provides simple Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care tools for managing stress, stress relief, and improving mental health.

https://www.facebook.com/DeStressM3/

recentChanges: Badges section updated.
comments: This has been a great app, it's especially useful when you're having an anxiety attack and you can't help yourself or have anyone to go to. Even if things escalate (suicidal ideation, self-harm etc) it still provides help and resources.

I have a VERY HIGH stress level.This app helps with calming my anxiety,looking at things in a more positive light,and is just THE BEST all around app that is FREE and HELPFUL.TRY IT-you'll love it,too!!!

De-stress Me is a mental well-being app based on cognitive-behavioral (CBT) techniques. I am currently a graduate student in psychology, and as such, I used this app with a discerning eye. The first time I opened the app I was greeted by a rather minimal interface with several options on the bottom of the screen, and a big de-stressMe button in the center. The options along the bottom allow you to input information including your strengths, ways to give thanks, and self-care ideas. The information that you input is used when you activate the de-stressing tool. One of the primary components of CBT is cognitive restructuring which entails challenging negative and automatic thoughts. The app cleverly integrates the information that you input into the bottom menus in order to assist you in challenging negatively oriented thoughts that you may experience during times of stress. Additionally, the app may suggest a technique that I am familiar with from my training, diaphragmatic breathing. The app does a good job of teaching and applying the basic tenants of both strategies. Overall, the app was helpful in reducing my stress and is based on sound psychological principles. I would recommend this app to anyone looking for a convenient and cost-effective way to reduce stress in their life.
Lovely, well designed and effective app. A must for those prone to stress and anxiety. Particularly love the images of progressing up a mountain in de-stress mode.
This app is really helping me! It seems simple but is highly effective the more a person practices with it. I'm glad this app is available and is free!

title: Colors: Anti-Stress, Relax, Sleep
description:
Do you need help on a stressful day? Are you overwhelmed? Do you have trouble sleeping? Colors helps you eliminate stress, relax or fall asleep easily, quickly and safely with a new way of improving emotions through color and the senses.

Experience the almost magical experience of immersing yourself in color light while listening to the sound of color with the sonocromatic compositions by Neil Harbisson.

Colors is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free.

Neil Harbisson @neilharbisson is the first cyborg in the world officially accepted by a government. The antenna implanted in his skull allows him to have a new sense: the ability to hear colors. Neil Harbisson has achromatism, a visual condition as a result of which he sees the world in grayscale.

Silvia Llad√≥s L√≥pez @silvia_colors, had a physical health problem that led her to investigate how exposure to color light can help us improve our emotional state and well-being.

Together they have developed Colors, an app that uses game, color psychology and stimulation through light and the sound of color, to find out the emotional state and eliminate stress, relax or fall asleep easily, quickly and safely .
The app has the support and advice of experts in the field of health.

Colors for Children:
(+4) used together with an adult. Ideal to help parents discover the emotional state of their children and help them every day to improve their emotions and fall asleep easily.

HOW IT WORKS:

1. You can use the app everywhere and anytime (works in airplane mode)

2. Unlimited access to free content without ads:

¬∑ Play to find your color
Drag, add, paint and remove colors for a few seconds to relax your mind, and decide, without thinking, what color you like most at this time. The color you choose will express how you feel.

¬∑ Discover the meaning of your color and how it can help you.

¬∑ Immerse yourself in color light using your mobile or tablet.
Do sessions anywhere, anytime! Wake up refreshed and happier with the wake-up option!

¬∑ Check your progress
Access the "Me" screen (silhouette icon) to see all your previous sessions, favorite colors, and check your progress.

Use it also in massage sessions, during a short nap, and even to make your child fall asleep faster!

3. Listen to the sound of color with the ‚ÄúSonochromatic Waves‚Äù by Neil Harbisson.

Live the almost magical experience of immersing yourself in color light while listening to the sound of color in all its amplitude.

Activate, through a subscription, the sonochromatic wave compositions Neil Harbisson has created for each color range that you can listen to while performing the light sessions.

A total of six sonochromatic waves that will let you experience an almost magical and unreal experience!

When setting up your session or scheduling your alarm clock, access the option ‚ÄúWaves‚Äù.


Colaborate with us:
Part of the benefits of the subscription are used to conduct scientific studies to investigate the benefits of exposure to color through light and sound stimulation.
Some content is only available through a subscription . If you choose to subscribe, the payment will be charged to your Google account at the time of subscription confirmation.

Put color to your life! Feel refreshed and happier

Tell us how you lived this experience! hello@colorstheapp.info

Copyright ¬© ColorsTheApp
"Sonochromatic Waves": Copyright ¬© Neil Harbisson

Live the almost magical experience of immersing yourself in color light while listening to the sound of color in all its amplitude.

Activate, through a subscription, the sonochromatic wave compositions Neil Harbisson has created for each color range that you can listen to while performing the light sessions.

A total of six sonochromatic waves that will let you experience an almost magical and unreal experience!

When setting up your session or scheduling your alarm clock, access the option ‚ÄúWaves‚Äù.


Colaborate with us:
Part of the benefits of the subscription are used to conduct scientific studies to investigate the benefits of exposure to color through light and sound stimulation.

title: Super Slime Simulator: Satisfying ASMR & DIY Games
description:
Play with slime on your mobile device. Stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it - just like you would with real slime or goo. Enjoy that oddly satisfying feeling without the mess or sticky fingers!
With tons of slimes to choose from, this app is for slime noobs and pro slime veterans, young and old, boys and girls! You can even take animated pictures of your slime and share them with your friends using your favorite social media apps.

App features:

- Play with your simulated slime right on your phone.
- Realistic slime simulation: Stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it - just like real slime!
- Rich slime gallery: Gooey, fluffy, cheesy, glittering and many more.
- Introducing: Magical Slimes! Kids, don‚Äôt try to make these at home - because you can‚Äôt!
- The Ugliest & Yuckiest: Flesh, brains, worms and more - these WILL gross out your friends.
- Not all slimes were created equal: Unique texture, color and behavior for each slime.
- DIY! Create your very own slime. Choose from multiple materials, colors and even add glitter, foam and other amazing stuff.
- Fun area: enjoy great slime activities including: Guessing Game & Slime Painter.
- Shake it till you make it: Shake your phone to undo stretches.
- Oddly Satisfying Sounds: Turn up the volume and listen to your slime squishing as you touch it.
- Take animated pictures of your slime and share them with everyone!

FOLLOW US at
Instagram @superslimesimulator

title: Awesome Breathing: Pacer for Meditation and Stress
description:
Awesome Breathing is a simple, elegant tool to guide and visualize your breathing. Use it daily to help with meditation, sleep, stress, anxiety, or to simply bring a few moments of calm or mindfulness to your day.

"Beautiful and responsive UI with customizable breathing patterns."

"I became interested recently in breathwork. This app is a fantastic aid to that work. I only discovered it after weeks of using stopwatches and timers. Great app, thank you!!!!"

"Excellent app, simple to use. As a psychotherapist I am using it myself and recommending to clients who might benefit."

"Simple. Intuitive. Beautiful UI and gestures. Amazing breath app that helps you stay mindful."

Features:

‚Ä¢ Clean, simple interface allows for uncluttered and calming breathing experience
‚Ä¢ Fully customizable inhale, exhale, and (optional) pause durations
‚Ä¢ Choose from included programs such as Box Breathing, Relaxing Breathing, Equal Breathing, Measured Breathing, and Triangle Breathing
‚Ä¢ Create and save custom programs!
‚Ä¢ Sessions can be free-form (no duration) or timed duration (up to 30 minutes)
‚Ä¢ Optional pre-session countdown timer allows for a few moments to "settle in" before your session begins
‚Ä¢ Choose from several pacer color themes
‚Ä¢ Optional guided vocal cues signal when to inhale, exhale, and hold so breathing can be done without looking at your device
‚Ä¢ Vibration mode allows for silent breathing sessions
‚Ä¢ Bells can be enabled to signal the beginning and end of your sessions

Included Programs:

Box Breathing (4-4-4-4)

Also known as Navy SEAL or tactical breathing, this is a surprisingly simple and effective way to help regain calm and control of your thoughts when under stress. Inhale for 4, hold for 4, exhale for 4, hold for 4. All through your nose.

Relaxing Breathing (4-7-8)

Have trouble falling asleep? Try this 4-7-8 technique. Inhale for 4 through your nose, hold for 7, exhale for 8 out of your mouth.

Equal Breathing (4-4)

A pranayama practice called Sama Vritti, this breath can help take your mind off the racing thoughts or whatever might be distracting you. Inhale for 4, exhale for 4. All through your nose. (Try a 6 or 8 count, once you feel comfortable.)

Measured Breathing (4-1-7)

A handy stress-reducing practice that can be done anywhere, anytime. Inhale for 4, hold for 1, exhale for 7. All through your nose.

Triangle Breathing (4-4-4)

Another great technique that can help alleviate anxiety or stress. Imagine a triangle with equal sides. Inhale for 4, exhale for 4, pause for 4. Repeat.

We hope Awesome Breathing helps you reach your goals, and look forward to being a part of your journey. We are just getting started, so would love to hear your reviews and feedback!

comments: This is a really fantastic breathing app. It is intuitive to use, has a range of common preprogrammed exercise but it is also extremely easy to create and customise your own. An added bonus is the lack of intrusive ads. If there is a better free breathing app I would be really surprised.

Wow! Truly an awesome app. I can customize inhale, hold, exhale, hold to 10th of sec. App calculates breaths per minute. I can set total time for a session. Audio cues mean I can breathe with my eyes closed. All of these can be saved to my own custom sessions. The added bonus is the ability to set notifications during the day to remind myself it's time to do a session. Great app!

It's rare that I will give something a positive rating after a mere two days but I am experiencing here with this program is amazing! I have done breathing exercises on my own and under guidance with varying degrees of positive results but this app is (even compared to a teacher's instruction) head and shoulders above everything else! Simple UI, voice and visual guidance, great programs that you can easily dedicate daily practice to...it's just great!

This is a great app for it lets you customized your own breathing program of inhales and exhales in decimal second increments. It also has a timer for how many minutes you want to do the breathing. I really wish they had a better choice for the beginning and end sound beside that loud gong noise for it is distracting after being relaxed from the meditative breathing. That is why the 4 rating.

An excellent app. Specifically because the custom timer allows for tenth of a second adjustments which allows me to set 5.5 second breaths for optimum resonant breathing sessions. I would give 5 stars were I able to set my own colours on the visualiser and change the jarring bell sound to something more muted and soft. This is an app I will use every day.

title: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder
description: Post-traumatic stress disorder affects men and women all over the world. It is a psychiatric disorder that occurs after life-threatening, or violent events and prevents people from living happy and fulfilling lives. Once thought of as only a wartime disorder, it is now recognized that PTSD can affect anyone who has gone through a particularly traumatizing event. In fact, more than 5 million American men and women are currently affected by the disorder.

I thank God for surviving ..5/8/1991
