title: Skills ‚Äì Games to cope with stress
description:
Skills is a collection of games that help you to focus on the here and now. The games are mindfulness and distress tolerance skills that can be used anywhere. Skills is developed together with psychologists according to "analogue" skills successfully used in therapy.

Skills can be used by anyone having to cope with stress. The app can also be used to assist self-management during psychotherapy.

When undergoing treatment for post-traumatic stress disorder, PTSD, or Borderline Personality Disorder, BPD, the application of skills are sometimes advised by your therapist. Skills are exercises to help you to refocus on the here and now. These exercises can improve your therapy experience, especially when using dialectical behaviour therapy or DBT.

There is an indication of the acceptance of the Skills app provided by BPD/PTSD patient feedback. By using the Skills app you have to determine together with your therapist whether the anti-dissociation skills / stress tolerance skills work for you or not. There is no claim to general effectiveness, we are currently working on that. By using the Skills app you have taken note of this and agree to our terms and conditions.
descriptionHTML:
Skills is a collection of games that help you to focus on the here and now. The games are mindfulness and distress tolerance skills that can be used anywhere. Skills is developed together with psychologists according to "analogue" skills successfully used in therapy.

Skills can be used by anyone having to cope with stress. The app can also be used to assist self-management during psychotherapy.

When undergoing treatment for post-traumatic stress disorder, PTSD, or Borderline Personality Disorder, BPD, the application of skills are sometimes advised by your therapist. Skills are exercises to help you to refocus on the here and now. These exercises can improve your therapy experience, especially when using dialectical behaviour therapy or DBT.

There is an indication of the acceptance of the Skills app provided by BPD/PTSD patient feedback. By using the Skills app you have to determine together with your therapist whether the anti-dissociation skills / stress tolerance skills work for you or not. There is no claim to general effectiveness, we are currently working on that. By using the Skills app you have taken note of this and agree to our terms and conditions.
summary: Skills are games to help cope with stress, anxiety, panic and dissociation

title: Steady - Breathing Meditation For Stress & Anxiety
description:
A breathing meditation app that helps you fights stress and anxiety through breathing exercises such as box breathing, and the popular 4-7-8 breathing pattern that helps with sleep. Let the timer and audio cues guide the rhythm of your breath as you breathe in and breathe out, inhaling the future and exhaling the past.

Pranayama ("prana" - life force, "yama" - regulation) is the conscious regulation & awareness of breath: the life force that both energizes and relaxes the body. It is no surprise that our breath can influence our physiology. Wim Hof, a Dutch extreme athlete, is noted for his ability to withstand freezing temperatures thanks to his breathwork. 

Even if you are not aiming to become an extreme athlete, you can enjoy the many benefits of breathwork such as strengthening your immune system (which can be confirmed by measuring your heart rate variability, a.k.a., HRV), improving your ability to deal with stress & anxiety, keeping asthma under control, etc.. In fact, you will notice an immediate sense of relaxation through a short minute of breathwork.

Deep breathing doesn't help. What helps is rhythm. Get into a rhythm.

APP FEATURES 

- 4 default programs: box breathing, triangle breathing, relaxing breathing, and ujjayi pranayama
- Custom your own breathing pattern/technique (for advanced users)
- Select background music (add an ambience to your meditation)
- Vibration cues (so you can breeth with your eyes closed)
- Choose between male & female audio cues
- Up to 3 daily reminders (you might be busy)
- Insightful statistics
- Set monthly goals
- Collect badges as you breathe
- Export data as CSV

USE CASES 

- As a daily habit/routine
- When you need to perform (e.g. before an interview, a presentation, or competition)
- Before bedtime to help you fall asleep
- As needed when feeling stressed or anxious

Disclaimer: 
Steady, a breathing meditation app, is not a substitute for your doctor visits, and it does not provide professional diagnosis or cure for your symptoms. Breeth with the app only if you are feeling well and consult your doctor before taking advice from the authors of the content in the app.

comments: I use it everyday. Pleasing animations, soothing ambient sounds and a super simple interface makes this app stand out. Best way to energize the start of my day or wind down before bed! Love that there are daily reminders, it helps cut through everyday distractions. But it should definitely be customizable, not fixed. Also, some sort of progress bar to visually complement the countdown would be nice and help me stay focused. PS. Kudos to the dev for being receptive & swift to act on feedback!

The app is really awesome! Also one thing that would be awesome is, maybe try to use any android phone for the screenshots of the app. And also maybe optimuse the app for the speed. The app seems a wee bit clunky, but that's alright as it's a new app as of writi this review. We all need some meditation app. This a good one, a one time fee is great.
Very practical app with an immaculate design. I just wish I could use a sound (like a bell) instead of human voices when being guided.

What I like about it is that when you feel stress or anxiety it has helps remind you to stop and take a deep breath. Something that is giving yourself a chance to unwind and relieve stress. Something so simple as remembering to just breathe.
This is an excellent way to reduce stress and promote healing. I will be using it daily as part of my self-care program.

title: MoodMission - Cope with Stress, Moods & Anxiety
description:
MoodMission helps you learn new and better ways of coping with stress, low mood, depression, and anxiety. Tell MoodMission how you‚Äôre feeling and it will give you a tailored list of 5 Missions that can help you feel better and improve your wellbeing. 

Missions are mental health strategies that are quick, easily achievable, and backed up by scientific evidence, including:
‚òÖ Mindfulness meditations
‚òÖ Relaxation
‚òÖ Exercise and fitness activities
‚òÖ Affirmations and coping statements
‚òÖ Behavioural activation
‚òÖ Yoga
‚òÖ Gratitude
And heaps of other proven mood boosting activities.

It's a simple as doing a Mission and boosting your mood.

MoodMission is based in cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT), which is an evidence-based psychological therapy for anxiety and depression. Anyone can use MoodMission, whether you just want a lift in your day or need a bit more help recovering from anxiety or depression.

A randomised controlled trial has shown that MoodMission can improve mental health and wellbeing (Bakker et al., 2019), and two other studies published in scientific journals have provided further support (Bakker & Rickard, 2019; Bakker et al., 2018). Randomised controlled trials are the gold standard of scientific evidence, and very few available mental health apps have RCT support (Firth et al., 2018).

Completing Missions earns you rewards in the app, motivating you to take steps towards becoming healthier, happier, and more confident. Plus a Mission log helps you track your progress over time.

MoodMission learns which types of Missions work best for you, so the more you use MoodMission the better it gets at tailoring your Mission suggestions.

MoodMission is not a replacement for professional help. If you are experiencing anxiety, depression, or any mental health issue, talk to your GP or contact a psychologist for support.

title: 5 Seconds Stress Test
description:
How many times did it happen to you - you try to relax on a day off, but your brain keeps taking you back to all the things you need to do?

Situations like these have become normal in our day to day life, but our health reacts vary negatively to it. 

Using this 5 Seconds Stress Test you will find out if you are exposed to big or bearable stress. All you need to do is to focus on a part of the picture in this 5 Seconds Stress Test and look at it for five seconds.

title: DeStressify-FREE Stress Relief
description:
Get stress relief that lasts. 

In as little as 10 minutes per day, learn life-changing skills for dealing with thoughts, emotions and beliefs that induce stress or anxiety. This comprehensive program addresses 5 key areas of stress relief: practices for calming the mind, emotional balance, relaxation, energizing exercises, and achieving joy. 

Techniques include guided imagery, visualizations, breathing and more. Watch a video exploring the causes of stress and your body‚Äôs physiological responses and discover how your thoughts and emotions are a key component. Listen to guided meditations or mindfulness exercises to experience a deep sense of calm right now. Let your cells resonate with some calming sound. You can focus on the stress relief practices that best speak to you.

Contains over 45 FREE bonus audio and video stress relief exercises from doctors, psychologists, PhD‚Äôs and renowned experts including Jon Kabat-Zinn, Dan Siegel, Kelly McGonigal, Tara Brach, Caroline Myss, Jack Kornfield and more. 

Begin to feel relief from stress right away. 

The core plan consists of 14 key practices to get you started. It is designed to cover everything you need to know in two weeks, practicing on average only 10 minutes per day. That is only about an hour and 15 minutes per week! The frequency of practicing is more important than the length of time spent each session so most sessions are built with a busy lifestyle in mind. 

You can schedule these practices and get reminders to help you keep to your stress relief practice goals. Record your stress levels over time to track your progress and stay motivated. This FREE evaluation version is loaded with the complete set of practices from the PRO version. Get Destressify PRO for even more features to keep you on track and help make it possible to continue to offer FREE stress relief for those who need it.

The latest neuroscientific research indicates that with repetition, the neural pathways of the brain rewire themselves for the new behaviors. After only a few months of practice, the changes become permanent and automatic. And you experience stress relief that lasts! Regardless of the challenges you face in your health, career, or relationships, it is possible to deal with them in a healthier way. 

Download this FREE app to discover if this program is right for you. Or check out DeStressify PRO for even more features!

title: InnerHour Self-Care Therapy - Anxiety & Depression
description:
Make self-care a priority with the InnerHour app

Do you want to overcome depression? Beat anxiety? Tackle stress? Or simply feel happier?

The InnerHour app is here to help!

Using their insights from therapy and the latest science in CBT (Cognitive Behaviour Therapy), Positive Psychology, and Mindfulness, our team of psychiatrists and psychologists have replicated the real-life therapy experience into a self-help app for you.

The app is your safe space for self-care, with 300+ therapy-based self-help tools designed for depression, anxiety, stress and other mental health concerns.

‚ñåSix self-help courses

‚Ä¢ Depression: Make small changes to overcome depression
‚Ä¢ Anxiety: Attain calm with strategies for anxiety relief
‚Ä¢ Sleep: Build a sleep schedule and develop habits to sleep better
‚Ä¢ Stress: Keep a check on your stress levels to feel in control
‚Ä¢ Anger: Channelise your anger and build learn strategies to cool down
‚Ä¢ Happiness: Develop critical skills to feel happier in life


‚ñåPersonalised 4-week plans

With the help of a scientific assessment, the app will identify your unique mental health needs and build a personalised self-care plan for depression, anxiety, stress & more.

So what does your plan entail?

1. Self-care activities

We have condensed decades of therapy experience and mental health research into simple activities - each teaching a strategy based on CBT, Positive Psychology, or Mindfulness. All you need is 5 minutes each day to work on yourself!

2. Goal setting and tracking

Our goal setting and tracking mechanism will help you build healthy habits that will last a lifetime. With this CBT-inspired feature, stay motivated to meet your physical and mental health goals - be it healthy eating,  exercising or thinking positively.

3. Mood tracking

Check-in with yourself with our specialised tracker! The more you track, the more insights you will get. You can even identify specific emotions and map your mood to different activities you engage in throughout the day.

4. InnerHour Resources

We want you to keep learning on your self-help journey. Our resources include articles, tips, and inspiring quotes to help you stay motivated. For instance, you will:

‚Ä¢ Understand the different causes of depression
‚Ä¢ Learn about the symptoms of anxiety
‚Ä¢ Know how to tell if it‚Äôs time to go to therapy

Your self-help plan is a reflection of what happens in real life therapy. Over 4 weeks, we hope to help you practise skills to battle depression, sleep better, get anxiety relief, and ultimately lead an emotionally healthy life.

Your self-care journey doesn‚Äôt have to end here‚Ä¶

‚Ä¢ Access additional self-help courses

We‚Äôve built shorter courses to offer support for more specific concerns like overthinking, social anxiety, loneliness & more. Just like in therapy, you can work on these specific areas in addition to your main plan.

‚Ä¢ Feel less alone with Allie

In times of distress, talk to Allie, our intelligent chatbot. Allie identifies your mental health difficulty at the moment - be it anxiety or depression - and offers simple activities to help you feel calm immediately.

‚Ä¢ Find hope, peace & stability during the health crisis

Access our limited-period self-help courses to get emotional support for dealing with the health crisis. You can also talk to Allie if you‚Äôre overwhelmed by what‚Äôs going on in the world.

Treat yourself to unlimited self-care, starting today.

The InnerHour app is free to download for all. A number of our offerings are available for free, including our Foundation courses, the Relief Bot, Self-Care Goals, the Mood Tracker, and InnerHour Resources.

For any questions, you can reach out to us on support@theinnerhour.com.
Visit our website: https://www.theinnerhour.com/

recentChanges: This World Mental Health Day, make your mental health a priority with our limited-period discounts. Enjoy!
comments: I love this app! I have been trying to keep my anxiety under control and I came across this app, I only have the free version so far but I can see myself purchasing the extras because its helping me so much! The only complaint I have is the voice recordings crackle midway through and its distracting. If this were fixed it would honestly be the best app I've ever downloaded. Thank you for making this wonderful app!

I tried to get a straightforward answer from them regarding the full set of features and costs for the two paid upgrades (Pro and Plus). After about 20 minutes of feeling like I was talking to a politician with talking points (that is, they just kept dodging the question and repeating answers that did not address what I was asking about), I simply gave up.

So far this app is great! I've only used it for a week or so now, but even just tracking my moods and writing them out helps me release some anxiety. I find the guided exercises helpful in putting my negative thoughts into perspective. I've been recommending this to many of my friends. While it's not a replacement for a therapist, it's a great way to check in with yourself each day. I hope they add therapy sessions outside of India someday! I'm sure it would help a lot of people.

So far I LOVE this app, it has already made a HUGE difference for me. More than anything else I have tried and I have been dealing with the same mental health problems for years and years. I really would love the premium but since the covid pandemic it's basically impossible for me to afford the premium. ‚òπÔ∏è I really wish there was another way for me to get the premium. Thank you SO much for making this app!!

The free services are everything you need except completely personalised options. So its a win in my book already. The bot is well made and is useful wherever you are (I've mostly had to use her in class, it was quick and easy without anyone noticing) Im keeping this app, it hasn't given me any trouble so I'd say if you see this on your for you page or in the search options its completely worth a shot.

title: Aurum - best therapy app, stress, anxiety.
description:
Welcome to Aurum, the platform which provides the best professional mental and emotional wellness ecosystem. Now manage your stress, anxiety, worry through our very popular programs. Get affordable therapy and access to expert psychologists through our app. Our users love us because we make it so easy and convenient to get access to quality care and help. All our professionals are based out of India and are vetted qualified experts. Go on and be the best version of yourself. Right away. 

Programs -
These are specially designed self-educating modules based on proven techniques like Cognitive Behavior Therapy(CBT), Mindfulness, Meditation and others which will help you learn the skills to cope with your issues. Be it stress, anxiety or relationships, you can learn at your own speed and master the skills required to face these problems. The best part is you will always have your coach - who is a certified psychologist, available on chat. Your coach will guide you throughout and help you achieve emotional and mental stability.

Therapy -
There are various incidents or situations in life where we can't seem to find our way out. The mental and emotional pressure becomes too much to handle. If you feel like you are going through a tough period of grief, sadness, anger, stress, anxiety, depression, worry etc connect with one of our qualified therapists at a fraction of the cost of traditional therapy. Your coach will be there for you round the clock, making sure you live your life in the best way possible. Getting access to a professional psychologist has never been so simple, easy and affordable.

*Now share positive affirmations with your loved ones and develop a positive mindset and learn how to have positive thoughts with expert guidance and self-help tools.*

We have created an entire ecosystem for you to get all the things necessary to become the best version of yourself. Solutions for Depression, CBT, Positive Affirmations, Life Coaching, Positive Mindset, Loneliness, Relationships, Mindfulness, Meditation, Therapy. Download now!

title: Psychology of Stress Management
description:
Over time stress can lead to you being less productive, uneasy, tense and even unhappy. You may find mental and physical symptoms affect your day to day life. In addition, a poor mood may make you more irritable, impatient and less communicative in your personal and business relationships. Stress can also affect your performance at work, making your less focused and motivated and less inclined to finish your tasks. 

Understanding how your mood and metal well-being impacts every part of your life and how poor feelings may negatively impact your activities, relationships and work and how having a happy balanced mood gives you the resources you need to be successful and productive. 

Included in our Psychology of Stress Management
* Understanding Your Triggers
* Understand the Concept of Change
* How to reduce the reactions to change
* Use mindful fullness meditation to help
* Steps to de-stress
* learn how to cope with frustration
* Taking charge of your actions and reactions
* and much, much more...

If stress is impacting the way you feel, your motivation, and your relationships then our Psychology of Stress Management is for you. Learn how you can reduce stress in your life and use tools to cope with frustration. Download our free Psychology of Stress Management today.

description:
Parents

Our guided relaxation exercises include parenting specific ones to soothe the parent self, as well as soothing tools for everyday stressors.


Teens

We‚Äôve tailored Insight for older and younger teens so you can access separate podcasts that relate to your life and stressors.


You can tailor Insight by saving your favourite exercises and podcasts, making them easily accessible when you need them. If you don‚Äôt like background music in your meditations or relaxation exercises, simply mute it and listen without.

title: Healthzilla: Heart Rate Monitor & HRV Stress Test
description:
Hi, I'm Zilla. Your fiery friend for a better, longer life. We're building your one app for Healthy Habits. Use the app to measure your Heart Rate and HRV, track your Stress & Recovery, and build Healthy Habits like Intermittent Fasting, Breathing Exercise, and Mindfulness Meditation.

CAMERA HEART RATE MONITOR, NO WEARABLE NEEDED!
Healthzilla can now monitor your Resting Heart Rate ("RHR") and Heart Rate Variability ("HRV") using your phone's camera. It takes just 60 seconds, and will measure your RHR (heart health) and HRV (stress & recovery) just like a wearable device. Do the Stress Scan every morning before getting out of bed for best results!

NEW: 16-HOUR INTERMITTENT FASTING TIMER
The latest health & fitness trend is Intermittent Fasting. Use our free fasting timer to fit the ideal 16:8 fast into your day. We'll notify you once you can eat again! If you forget to set the timer in the evening, you can edit the start time to capture your fast.

NEW: 10-MINUTE MINDFULNESS MEDITATION TIMER
The easiest way to fit some mindfulness meditation into your day is to use our unguided meditation timer, with beautiful Tibetan gongs to help you stay focused on your meditation.

NEW: 2-MINUTE RELAXING BREATHING EXERCISE
If you're feeling anxious or stressed out, take just two minutes to try our Breathing Exercise. The 1:2 ratio of inhale to exhale will activate your parasympathetic nervous system to calm you down instantly!

TRACK YOUR STRESS & RECOVERY TRENDS
The dashboard shows a weekly chart of your Heart Rate and HRV data. If your Heart Rate is HIGHER than normal, it may be an indicator of higher physiological or psychological stress. Similarly, if your HRV is much lower than normal, it will indicate higher stress levels. You can use this information to guide your recovery from workouts, and generally planning your daily activities at work. For active recovery, you can also focus on sleep or add meditation and breathing exercises.

DAILY STRESS SCORE
After each Stress Scan, we calculate your Stress Score based on recent trends: Great, Good, Easy, Rest, or Sick. Use this as a guide for your daily wellness routines, activities, and workouts.

ANOMALY DETECTION
To help you make sense of this data, our Stress Score algorithm checks for unusually high or low values for your heart rate. Very low HRV or very high Heart Rate can be signs of acute stress, injury, or illness.

FEELING UNWELL?
You can now manually override your daily Stress Score, if you're feeling stressed or unwell. You can access the override from the dashboard, or after your daily Stress Scan.

RESTING HEART RATE (‚ÄúRHR‚Äù)
This data is much more important than your real-time heart rate. What‚Äôs the difference? Heart Rate represents how much work your heart has to do when you‚Äôre relaxed. It‚Äôs not exactly the same as the lowest heart rate you have when you sleep.

The reason resting heart rate is important is that it‚Äôs a rough measure of your nervous system activity, hormone levels, and cardiovascular fitness. There is research to show that lower resting heart rate means longer life.

HEART RATE VARIABILITY (‚ÄúHRV‚Äù)
Okay, so we know heart rate is your pulse. How many times the heart beats per minute. So what is this voodoo, then? Well, it turns out that the beats per minute aren‚Äôt steady. There‚Äôs a minute variation between each one. Some shorter, some longer.

This is some of the most interesting new data out there, because HRV is actually a representation of your central nervous system. If you‚Äôre not exactly sure what that is, it‚Äôs basically your wiring. How signals pass between your brain and the rest of your body. Analyzing this signal indicates if your body is in fight or flight mode, or rest and digest mode. Naturally, you wouldn‚Äôt want to unnecessarily be in fight mode which stresses out your body over time.

Read our full terms of service: 
https://healthzilla.ai/terms

title: Anti Stress Meditation
description:
This app is no longer being supported, please consider using our (much better) new app in the Play Store called "Meditation App by Balance In Me".  Our new app has loads of free audio meditations in it, plus cool related content. 

Enjoy 7 different audios that will help you eliminate stress from your life.

It's 100% free and ad free. You will never see an ad on this app - ever! And there are no in app purchases or anything. This is free. For you. I want you to enjoy it.

Now includes a guided journey meditation in a relaxing island! This guided meditation was created by an expert coach from BalanceInMe.com. Enjoy!

So in total the app has 7 sounds:

- 1 guided meditation
- 3 sounds of nature (very relaxing)
- 3 binaural beats
- 1 meditation audio (super relaxing)

Plus if there are good ratings I plan to add many more in the future, so give this app many 5 star ratings, will you :)

Remember, this is 100% free and I never expect anything from you. I just want this to be the best meditation app for combating stress on Android!

The app also includes a timer. By default, when the audio finishes (if there's time left) it will just play the audio again. Most audios are between 10 and 15 minutes, although the guided meditation is a full 20 minutes long! Feel free to send me an e-mail (my e-mail is at the bottom) with suggestions for new audios.

Feel free to send me your own audios or guided meditations if you wish to have them included in this app.

Thank you!

Joaquin from BalanceInMe.com

title: Fear Buster: Deep Relaxation and Stress Relief
description:
Create Calm. Feel Relief. Enjoy Inner Peace.

Fear Buster is more than a way to relax and create calm -- it's your personal guide to breaking free from your stress and fear so you can move forwards with hope and confidence. Its unique format gives you the freedom to set your own pace and choose the tools that work for you:

Fear Buster First Aid

Here, fast first aid tools for people on the go give you urgent relief from your stress, fear and anxieties, enabling you to relax, think clearer and respond more calmly and quickly in stressful times.  Each tool is unique, giving you the freedom to choose what works best for you, from mindful breathing, to soulful grounding, to the powerful and effective Havening Techniques and more.

Fear Buster Changing Room

These 10 minute techniques give you deeper relief from your stress, anxieties and fears ‚Äì helping you to build hope and confidence moving forwards.  This is the opportunity to dive deeper into your issues and truly begin to change from fear to calm.

Specific topics include How to:

           ‚óè Change fear for the health and wellbeing of myself and those I love into hope and calm.
           ‚óè Release fear for the future and embrace the unknown with confidence.
           ‚óè Release the fear of failing my children - how to release my secret fear of failing as a parent and forgive yourself for your mistakes.
           ‚óè Adapt to change with ease - learn to adapt to change with resilience and hope. 
           ‚óè Stop being affected by other people's issues ‚Äì how to keep your center when those around you are freaking out.
           ‚óè Release the fear of failing my exams - how to improve your results by improving your performance abilities.
           ‚óè Changing my dreams for a great sleep -- releasing anxious thoughts and fears while drifting down the gentle River of Dreams.
   
No subscriptions -- just great tools to change your life now.

title: Calm Meditation Stress Relief Breathing Exercises
description:
Breathe!!! Your life depends on it. With Calm Meditation Stress Relief Breathing Exercises we have created a neat and to the point experience of Energy, Relaxation and Calm Meditation all based on the very natural and simple action, Breathe.

This Calm Meditation Stress Relief Breathing Exercises app has a research of many years behind it; breathing exercises are something that we don‚Äôt hear about enough. These breathing exercises are designed in a way that they can be done anywhere anytime. There are three types of breathing exercises within the app for calm meditation that serve different purposes.

We have taken into account the biggest challenges that we face in this day and age; 

‚Ä¢	Stress 
‚Ä¢	Anxiety
‚Ä¢	Low energy
‚Ä¢	Disconnection with inner self

Surprisingly these all can be greatly impacted with breathing exercises done properly for calm meditation. Stress and anxiety are a problem for every other person today; stress in turn creates anxiety, low self-esteem and in turn physiological symptoms start to appear. Stress can be treated by shifting the state of mind into a no stress state by any internal or external stimulus or simply if you Relax and use calm meditation. 

Our app Calm Meditation Stress Relief Breathing Exercises has a special mode that focus on calming the anxiety and relieving the stress of the user by the power of breath to get relaxed with Calm Meditation Stress Relief Breathing Exercises app.

There are so many products from energy drinks to naps we seek to energize ourselves to the fullest; you must have tried some but Calm Meditation Stress Relief Breathing Exercises is the best and most natural tool to energize you instantly with the power of breathing exercise. 

Breathe to energize; Breathe to Relax and off course Breathe to dive deep into the inner self, the power of breathing exercises in Calm meditation Stress relief and yoga is undeniable. 

We have included as special breath for diving deep into calm meditation Stress relief and reaching the state of mindfulness. Mindfulness is when we become aware of our thoughts and drop all ego and judgments; Calm Meditation Stress Relief Breathing Exercises is the tool that helps you attain that meditative state in an instant.

This app is designed to be your everyday companion to energize, anxiety/stress relief and Calm meditation aid. With carefully selected modes we have made sure that we try and solve the most crucial problems. 

Some guidelines to use Calm Meditation Stress Relief Breathing Exercises,

‚Ä¢	Always sit with your back straight prior to any breathing session
‚Ä¢	Inhale through your nose and exhale through your mouth for effective breathing
‚Ä¢	Inhale with stomach expanding and exhale with it contracting
‚Ä¢	Use headphones for optimal experience

We have three different feedback in this Calm Meditation Stress Relief Breathing Exercises app namely;

‚Ä¢	Visual: By the on-screen animation for open eye breathing exercises
‚Ä¢	Auditory: By breathing assist sounds for closed eye breathing exercises (headphones 
        recommended)
‚Ä¢	Physical: By phone vibrations on body for closed eye breathing exercises

For a quick session in Calm Meditation Stress Relief Breathing Exercises we recommend,

‚Ä¢	20 Breaths for Instant Energy
‚Ä¢	10 Breaths for Relaxation and Calm meditation Stress Relief
‚Ä¢	5 Breaths for diving into deep Calm Meditation 

Looking forward to your feedback for further improvements.

Keep Breathing.

Download ‚ÄúCalm meditation Stress Relief app and give us feedback so that we can make more apps for you.

title: Stress Management
description:
This Stress Management application contains tips to Manage Anxiety and Stress. When you're feeling anxious or stressed, these strategies will help you cope. We also cover Stress management techniques and how to recognize and reduce stress, solutions to make life more positive and productive.

Stress is the most common cause of ill health, probably underlying as many as 70% of all visits to family doctors. The good news is that you can learn ways to manage it. Becoming proficient in stress management is essential for developing self-security and the ability to effectively deal with the pressures.

Stress management should be crucial part of our daily lifestyle in order to beat stress and live a relaxed and happy life.

Well, there are thousands of reasons behind stress development however; there are so many ways to get rid of stress easily.

So, are you suffering from high level of stress?

Do you want to reduce your stress level?

Are you looking for some simple and easy approaches to beat stress?

You can protect yourself by recognizing the signs and symptoms of stress and taking steps to reduce its harmful effects.

This Stress Management Application will gives you complete idea about Stress , its symptoms and stress management in simple and efficient way.

Yes, download app absolutely free and follow the instructions to get the quick and great result.

Relax and get this exclusive app and adopt the ideas elaborated inside as your best solution.
Here is the sneak-peak of the content you will receive inside the app:

1) Stress Management
2) Relaxation Techniques 
3) Yoga and Stress Management
4) Suggestions to reduce stress
5) Taking care of ourselves
6) Stress Reliever Jokes
Compilation of jokes, funny stories and pics that will make you smile or laugh!
7) Stress Reliever Game
Enjoy your Punch Box stress reliever game to kill your bored time and release your stress!

Download Stress Reliever application now!! It‚Äôs free!!

Keep Calm And Don't Stress...

DISCLAIMER :
Content like Articles, Pictures and Video in this application were collected from all over the web, so if I have violated your copyright, please let me know and it will be removed as soon as possible.

Stress is the most common cause of ill health, probably underlying as many as 70% of all visits to family doctors. The good news is that you can learn ways to manage it. Becoming proficient in stress management is essential for developing self-security and the ability to effectively deal with the pressures.

Stress management should be crucial part of our daily lifestyle in order to beat stress and live a relaxed and happy life.

Well, there are thousands of reasons behind stress development however; there are so many ways to get rid of stress easily.

So, are you suffering from high level of stress?

Do you want to reduce your stress level?

Are you looking for some simple and easy approaches to beat stress?

You can protect yourself by recognizing the signs and symptoms of stress and taking steps to reduce its harmful effects.

This Stress Management Application will gives you complete idea about Stress , its symptoms and stress management in simple and efficient way.

Yes, download app absolutely free and follow the instructions to get the quick and great result.

Relax and get this exclusive app and adopt the ideas elaborated inside as your best solution.
Here is the sneak-peak of the content you will receive inside the app:

1) Stress Management
2) Relaxation Techniques
3) Yoga and Stress Management
4) Suggestions to reduce stress
5) Taking care of ourselves
6) Stress Reliever Jokes
Compilation of jokes, funny stories and pics that will make you smile or laugh!
7) Stress Reliever Game
Enjoy your Punch Box stress reliever game to kill your bored time and release your stress!

Download Stress Reliever application now!! It‚Äôs free!!

Keep Calm And Don't Stress...

title: Stress Reduction-Audio-Full
description:
Want to better learn how to relax and find some stress relief?  Stress Reduction-Audio contains three guided relaxation techniques to guide you through the process of becoming more fully relaxed. Be sure to try Stress Reduction-Audio-Free first, to see if the techniques help you to become more relaxed.  Some people also find these techniques helpful for getting to sleep at night.  Additionally, the app includes a number of peaceful nature sounds that may be used to help fall asleep.  This full version lets you play these sounds for up to 8 full hours.

The Full version downloads the full audio files to your device rather than streaming them from a remote server each time you run the app, and does not contain ads.

Two relaxation techniques are included along with a peaceful and relaxing background music.

1. Relax and Breathe - Walks you through relaxing all the muscles in your body combined with a deep breathing exercise. (8 minutes)

2. Relax and Visualize - This technique is a mildly self-hypnotic procedure that includes relaxing your muscles, mind, and visualizing a peaceful scene.  This is often a favorite. (15 minutes)

3. Contrast Technique - This technique has you tense your muscles first and then relax them.  Some people find this technique works when some of the other techniques do not. (15 minutes)

Note: These techniques are not intended to treat any emotional or physical condition.  Rather, this app is intended for people who want to learn one of many techniques for coping with the stress of everyday living.  If recommended by a psychotherapist, it may be used as a part of a larger treatment program.

title: Stress Relief Exercises
description:
Stress Relief Exercises is a straightforward set of 7 carefully selected relaxing and stress-alleviating exercises.

It has been proved that proper physical activity reduces stress. Even if you have never engaged in sports or fitness, this effective set of exercises will help you relax, alleviate anxiety, get rid of negative emotions, reduce and eventually manage stress.

But don‚Äôt worry ‚Äì we will not make your pump iron though. Our antistress gymnastics approach with a grain of fitness on top, aims at stretching muscles and removing strain from them rather than adding it.

You can exercise any time and even more than once per day as soon as you feel the need for relaxation. To eliminate insomnia and improve sleep we highly recommend performing this exercise routine before going to bed.

On average each exercise should take from 30 seconds to one minute. The whole routine therefore takes around 5 minutes. Eventually you can increase the time for each exercise if you feel like it. When doing these exercises try to achieve full relaxation. Do not think about anything and concentrate only on breathing.

We've also included the Stress-relief Nutrition Advice section featuring top stress-eliminating products and tips on a proper stress-relieving menu.

title: BeSerene | Mind Training and Stress Management App
description:
BeSerene is an app-based platform that guides the user towards better mental health by training the mind to develop resilience to the stress.

It delivers a revolutionary, unique and comprehensive program that imparts the knowledge and awareness about the vital stress-causing and stress-induced disorders and conditions as well as their management techniques. Primarily the App manages Anxiety, Depressive Tendencies, Sleep, Fear, Anger and Relationship Issues.

Measurable Improvement

Various static, process and outcome data variables are collected to assess the progress of the user throughout the program. Periodically and at the end of the program, a detailed progress report is shared with the user, which helps the user to measure his mental health improvement.

Integrative Approach - Psychological and Spiritual

BeSerene provides the user with an option to choose from two approaches, psychological and spiritual. Both methods support Yoga and Mindful Meditation. The psychological approach focuses on emotional, cognitive, behavioural and psychosomatic factors to deal with the mind's accumulated conditioning. The spiritual one focuses on the overall training & wellbeing of the person to deal with the mental conditioning.

Preventive and Therapeutic

BeSerene guides the user towards better health by educating the user about various stress constituents and their symptoms as well as the management techniques. In the cases of early-stage, the deterioration is arrested. At the same time, care is taken during stressful situations.

Comprehensive and Cost-Effective

Amongst available conventional and non-conventional solutions, BeSerene is one of the most comprehensive solutions that cover most of the aspects of mental wellbeing and is one of the most cost-effective solutions.

Features and Tools

BeSerene is supported on a Tech Platform supporting wearable devices, remote digital interaction, AI-based ChatBot. Further, it has a detailed analytical engine used for

personalization of the coursework. A dashboard is provided to the user to manage and monitor his or her activities.

In the introspection section, several data variables are collected, and tips are given to the user in the form of reflective tasks in the reflection section.

Should one feel the need to interact with a live coach, the App has a provision for connecting the user with a coach over digital mediums.

The App also supports a rich Media Library which is a repository of activities. One can find various Yoga Asanas, Breathing Exercises, Light Exercises, Mudras, Mindful Meditation, Soothing Music, Articles, Videos, etc.

Detailed screening is periodically administered to the user to assess the current conditioning levels.

Daily Course Flow

Each of the constituents of the stress is handled in a separate course. The average duration of each of the course is about 30 to 60 days, and a user is expected to spend anywhere between 10 to 40 minutes a day.

A personalized activity schedule for the day is given, which is based on the Profile, Preferences, Body vitals and existing symptoms as reported by the user.

Awareness is a learning section where a user is given course work in the form of video with voice over and graphical representations for easy assimilation.

Introspection is a session where user can self-report some of the process variables such as mood, appetite, soundness of sleep, etc. daily.

Lastly, Reflections session is given where the user undertakes reflection tasks at his own pace. The system does not analyze these tasks; however, in future, if required, these inputs can be shared with the coach.

Reports and measurements

Periodical measurements are taken for several data variables, and reports are generated for the user to know the progress and improvements.

title: Wandr. - Stress, Anxiety & Panic Relief
description:
*Important: Wandr. requires at least 4GB of RAM to run its best *


When life gets busy and overwhelming, turn to your Wandr. app to calm your breathing and dissolve worrying thoughts to feel noticeable relief from stress, anxiety and panic attacks. 

It‚Äôs the virtual nature escape in your pocket when you need it the most. 

This completely unique virtual nature walk app transports users to peaceful locations to properly relax, help calm the mind and provide immediate help during panic/anxiety attacks. 

Best suited for those who;

‚Ä¢   Suffer from anxiety, panic attacks and mental over-stimulation
‚Ä¢   By nature struggle to actually ‚Äòrelax‚Äô or don‚Äôt know how to
‚Ä¢   Need help calming the mind quickly for sleep
‚Ä¢   Are affected by city living or work stress 
‚Ä¢   Find themselves restricted in going outside for any reason


‚ÄúI find it hard to relax and felt extremely relaxed after using the app. Nice way to wind down after a busy day before bed. Forest feels like home, can almost smell the trees üôÇ‚Äù Iain  - Anxiety, Work Stress, Restricted Movement.

‚ÄúIt's great! I really enjoyed the night beach scene. I've had a stressful day and I found it to be very relaxing. I thought the sound of the crackling fire was brilliant, very authentic. Helped calm my busy mind to get to sleep. Thank you‚Äú Diane ‚Äì Anxiety, Busy Mind. 

‚ÄúVery relaxing. I struggle to get to sleep at night and have stress from energetic kids. I felt noticeably more relaxed after using the app. Also loved chasing the animals, went for a swim - very enjoyable.‚Äù Luke ‚Äì Busy parent, Insomnia.

‚ÄúI really loved them all (scenes) but the Waterfall scenery would have to be my favourite. Climbing up the rocks to the waterfall seemed like I was truly exploring somewhere different. Then to hear the water get louder as I approached was soothing and calming. The sky's pink tones were also beautiful to gaze at.‚Äù Amanda - Anxiety.


Features Include:

5 Different Nature Scenes

Breathe Tool

Relaxation Music

Customisable Nature Sounds

Guided Muscle Relaxation Audio

Sleep Sounds

Positive Affirmations to self-soothe during an anxiety or panic attack. 

Free Options that are actually helpful!

Professional Healthcare Resources


Objective:

Become calm. Feel properly relaxed. Regain control. Anywhere, anytime.

Beyond taking a short walk in a relaxing environment, there are no objectives within a scene.

Casually explore the surrounds taking it all in, or just find a view that calms you and sit and stare - like you would if you really were sitting alone on a secluded island beach.

Take your time. There‚Äôs no rush to the next level or time limit to the finish line. Nothing is chasing you and there‚Äôs nothing you need to achieve. Just enjoy where the escape takes you. 

Try it now for free!

Panic/Anxiety Attack Suffers: We recommend you download it and get to know the app now so you can have it ready to help you during your next attack. 

‚ÄúMade for others like us who need easy tools to help manage our anxiety and panic attacks living a busy city life.‚Äù @wandr.relief

title: Yoga For Stress Relief
description:
Yoga for Stress Relief

Yoga is a mind-body practice that combines physical poses and controlled breathing to help reduce stress, lower blood pressure and lower your heart rate. And almost anyone can do it.

This yoga sequence combines a number of poses that will help you achieve peacefulness of body and mind to help you relax and manage stress and anxiety.

Practice this sequence every day to reduce stress, anxiety and tension. Learn about specific yoga poses that promote relaxation and calmness.

This yoga sequence is great for a tired body and a busy mind. Try this sequence to calm the nervous system and do a little energetic hygiene as you relive anxiety and stress from the body. Connect to your breath and take some time for you. Let go of that which is no longer serving you! Open your mind, your heart and stretch & soothe your body.

Enjoy!

This yoga sequence is great for a tired body and a busy mind. Try this sequence to calm the nervous system and do a little energetic hygiene as you relive anxiety and stress from the body. Connect to your breath and take some time for you. Let go of that which is no longer serving you! Open your mind, your heart and stretch & soothe your body.

Enjoy!

title: Cardiac coherence: reduce stress and anxiety
description:
Simple and ergonomic, discover the Cardiac coherence application which will allow you to understand the benefits of cardiac coherence for your health‚ú®. 


 Say goodbye to your daily stress and your anxiety! üòÄ 
 

Features:  

- Choice of music üé∂ 

- Choice of a sound on inspiration and or on expiration üéº 

- Set a vibration for transitions üì≥ 

- Create your personalized session: choice of music, duration, animation üÜí 

- Personalized entertainment ‚òÄÔ∏è 

- History of its sessions üìú 

- Modify the duration of your sessions, and of each inspiration and expiration üïî 

- Completely customizable application, you choose everything, from music to animation, including durations and different sounds as well as transition vibrations. üéâ



Thanks to the transition sounds and vibrations, you can practice  even without looking at your screen and wherever you want, even in the dark since the screen can be turned off!  üëå

 

You are the master of the place and choose everything in the smallest detail, the application was thought  by users and for users of Cardiac Coherence . üéâ


 Why should you do cardiac coherence?  
 

Cardiac coherence is a fast and very effective practice for reducing stress and anxiety, and also allows long-term control of one's emotions.
The goal of heart coherence could not be simpler, it is enough to breathe following cycles of 5 seconds of inspiration for 5 seconds of expiration. However, if you want to change this you can in the application. You can change the duration of inspiration and expiration to the second you want to adapt the application entirely to your needs. In the long term, cardiac coherence brings significant benefits as for the practice of meditation. Among other things, there will be a reduction in symptoms of depression, and a reduction in blood pressure.
For the immediate many effects will be felt, this is why the practice of cardiac coherence to many followers. 

 Here are some of its immediate effects:  

- Physical and mental soothing. üòé 

- Better sleep. üí§ 

- Increase in the amplitude of cardiac variability. üíñ 

- Decreased cortisol (stress hormone, lots of negative effects at a high rate). üìâ 

- Increased secretion of DHEA (anti aging). üìà 

- Improved memory and coordination. üß† 

- Increased secretion of serotonin. ü§ó 


Cardiac coherence is an excellent introduction to meditation, but also a very good complement to it.
Ideally, it is recommended to do 3 cardiac coherence sessions per day, that makes 15 minutes of practice. It is really little compared to the benefits of practicing it. You can for example do a session in the morning when you wake up before going to work, another at noon to mark the break, as well as a last one when you come home in the evening to relax from your day.
Finally, these are only our recommendations, it's up to you to build your own program according to your needs and desires üôÇ.
Do not forget the many benefits of the practice, this will allow you to keep yourself motivated constantly so as not to relax the practice.
We sincerely hope that you will like the application, it was designed with simplicity and beauty to satisfy each of our users.
We remain at your disposal to improve our application, so do not hesitate to contact us and especially to leave a note to thank us for the work on the application ‚ò∫Ô∏è.

title: Stress Reduction Techniques
description:
It may seem like there‚Äôs nothing you can do about stress. The bills won‚Äôt stop coming, there will never be more hours in the day, and your work and family responsibilities will always be demanding. But you have a lot more control than you might think. In fact, the simple realization that you‚Äôre in control of your life is the foundation of managing stress. Stress management is all about taking charge: of your lifestyle, thoughts, emotions, and the way you deal with problems. No matter how stressful your life seems, there are steps you can take to relieve the pressure and regain control.  

For all tips and solutions you will find carefully selected videos for you

Download it's simple and free
Support us by clicking on 5 stars *****

title: Resony: anxiety, stress & low mood self-management
description:
About Resony

Resony provides scientifically proven techniques to improve physical and emotional health and enhances productivity, even under pressure. This is achieved through reducing negative stress, anxiety and low mood and by building positive resources for enduring resilience. The techniques are developed by our experienced medical team and are based on neuroscience, positive psychology, behavioural science and physiology. Resony offers an integrated approach towards building resilience, addressing mind and body simultaneously to achieve faster and more sustainable results.

What does Resony do

The app is your personal guide to reduce negative stress, anxiety and low mood by building positive resources for resilience and sustainable peak performance at work. It starts with measuring your emotional well-being by asking a few simple questions. Based on your responses, Resony gives you a emotional well-being score and personalised techniques to improve your well-being and reduce stress, anxiety and low mood. Using the dashboard, you can track your score and verify if the techniques benefit you.

Main features of Resony

‚òÖ Wellbeing Check: 7-item self-assessment questions to personalise techniques and to track intensity of symptoms 
‚òÖ Resonant breathing: Reduce stress and anxiety and build resources for resilience and sustainable peak performance under pressure 	
‚òÖ Acute Stress Release Techniques: Assist before, during and after experiencing challenging situations
‚òÖ Progressive Muscle Relaxation: Deep relaxation to support ‚Äúletting go‚Äù, recovery and regeneration
‚òÖ Constructive Worry: Neutralise the impact of negative emotions, such as worry, anxiety, fear, anger etc. by raising emotions into conscious awareness and by neutralising them through naming them with precision. Based on cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT)
‚òÖ Constructive Gratitude: Gratitude journaling that helps reframe negative experience and create an enduring positive emotional state that is a foundation for stress reduction and creating adaptive resilience
‚òÖ Prioritised To-Do-List: Linked to constructive worry and constructive gratitude techniques which strengthens the power to implement change and enhances a sense of control
‚òÖ Nature Observation: Mindfulness technique to deepen your connection with nature and enhances concentration and memory
‚òÖ Active listening: Mindfulness technique which strengthens positive relationships and improves communication


What are the benefits of using Resony?

Using the techniques for 10-20 minutes daily can benefit you in the following ways:

Health & Well-being
‚Ä¢	Improve and maintain your health and well-being
‚Ä¢	Improve your sleep
‚Ä¢	Boost recovery from strain and ill health
‚Ä¢	Rejuvenation (healthy ageing) 

Emotion Regulation
‚Ä¢	Deal more effectively with pressure, trauma, change and crisis
‚Ä¢	Improve your regulation of emotions 
‚Ä¢	Reduce stress, anxiety, anger, fear and low mood 

Productivity at work (and home)
‚Ä¢	Access sustainable high-performance states of flow easily, even under pressure
‚Ä¢	Improve decision-making capacity in challenging circumstances 
‚Ä¢	Improve performance under pressure
‚Ä¢	Enhance creativity 
‚Ä¢	Boost confidence to handle problems
‚Ä¢	Access resourcefulness for problem solving
‚Ä¢	Improve concentration, memory and cognitive processing under pressure
‚Ä¢	Improve social skills

title: 3DMark - The Gamer's Benchmark
description:
3DMark is a popular benchmarking app that helps you test and compare the performance of your smartphone and tablet.

3DMark benchmarks the GPU and CPU performance of your device. At the end of the test, you get a score, which you can use to compare models. But 3DMark also gives you so much more.

More than a score 
3DMark is designed around data-driven stories that help you learn more about your smartphone and tablet. With its unique charts, lists and rankings, 3DMark gives you unrivaled insights into the performance of your device. 

‚Ä¢ Compare your score with others from the same model. 
‚Ä¢ Compare your device‚Äôs performance with other popular models. 
‚Ä¢ See how your device‚Äôs performance changes with each OS update. 
‚Ä¢ Discover the devices that perform consistently without slowing down. 
‚Ä¢ Search, filter and sort our lists to compare the latest mobile devices.

Best benchmark for your device 
When you open the app, 3DMark will recommend the best benchmark for your device. To save storage space and minimize download times, you can choose which tests you want to install. 

Run Wild Life, our new cross-platform benchmark, to compare new Android devices from Google, Huawei, LG, OnePlus, Oppo, Motorola, Samsung, Sony, Vivo, Xiaomi and other manufacturers with the latest iPhone and iPad models. 

3DMark Wild Life offers two ways to test your device: a quick benchmark that tests instant performance and a longer stress test that shows how your device performs under longer periods of heavy load.

Choose Sling Shot or Sling Shot Extreme benchmarks to compare low- to mid-range Android devices with older iPhone and iPad models. 

Choose your next phone the easy way 
With in-app performance data for thousands of devices, it is easy to find and compare the best smartphones and tablets with 3DMark. Search, filter and sort the in-app rankings to compare the latest Android and iOS devices. 

Download 3DMark for free 
3DMark is a free app. There are no ads or in-app purchases. Download it today and join millions of people who choose 3DMark for accurate and impartial benchmark results.

System requirements
‚Ä¢ Wild Life benchmarks require Android 10 or above and 4 GB or more of RAM.
‚Ä¢ All other benchmarks require Android 5 or above.

This app is for non-commercial use only.
- Business users contact UL.BenchmarkSales@ul.com for licensing.
- Members of the press, please contact UL.BenchmarkPress@ul.com.

title: Stress Relief
description:
Stress Relief - relaxation and mental training for a more enjoyable life.
 
Have you had enough of the stress, the demands and the bad moods? And want effective help to find your way back, recharge and fill yourself with new energy? Or have you decided not to fall into the stress trap and would like to be better able to find your best mood? This is the app for you who want to have balance in life and become more of ‚Äúbon vivant‚Äù. 
 
Three contributing causes of stress are lack of self-control, lack of support from the environment and lack of meaning in what we do. There are many who try to fill the emptiness they feel in their lives with more and more work.
 
One day, when life becomes too much, symptoms begin such as stomach problems, headaches, irritability, or colds that never let go. These can be followed by at deep depression resulting from chronic fatigue which makes the body collapse because of the complete depletion of resources and energies.
 
But you won‚Äôt let it go that far. Besides information on stress, a stress test, exercises and stress management tips the app also includes two relaxation exercises that will keep you on track.

‚Ä¢	muscular relaxation
‚Ä¢	say no calmly and easily 

Stress Relief is part of a series of apps made by Eva Johansson and recorded by Laurel Wakeman, who usually gets feedback on having a warm, lovely and relaxing voice.

title: Stress Less TRE
description: TRE stands for Tension & Trauma Releasing Exercises. TRE is a simple technique, developed by Dr. David Berceli, that uses exercises to release stress or tension from the body that accumulates from every day circumstances of life, from difficult situations, immediate or prolonged stressful situations, or traumatic life experiences (i.e., natural disasters, social or domestic violence). This app is designed to teach you more about TRE, take you through the exercises with step-by-step instructions, and provide you with tools to track your progress. By using this app we hope you will join thousands of people from all over the world who have experienced healing from chronic stress, emotional trauma, and everyday tension and anxiety. TRE ‚Äì release, rebalance, renew.
descriptionHTML: TRE stands for Tension & Trauma Releasing Exercises. TRE is a simple technique, developed by Dr. David Berceli, that uses exercises to release stress or tension from the body that accumulates from every day circumstances of life, from difficult situations, immediate or prolonged stressful situations, or traumatic life experiences (i.e., natural disasters, social or domestic violence). This app is designed to teach you more about TRE, take you through the exercises with step-by-step instructions, and provide you with tools to track your progress. By using this app we hope you will join thousands of people from all over the world who have experienced healing from chronic stress, emotional trauma, and everyday tension and anxiety. TRE ‚Äì release, rebalance, renew.
summary: Release stress/tension from the body, life occuring from circumstances or trauma
recentChanges: Bug Fix and Security Enhancement
comments: I do the routine at night when I can't fall asleep, these exercises really work.
Keeps on hanging

title: Stress Management
description:
If you are looking for an app that tell you about stress management, this is the suitable app for you. Managing our stress is crucial as it not only affect our life but our surrounding too.

we need a good stress in life in order to improve ourselves , to improve own self-worth. But there is no doubt there will be additional stress that will come which will become a bad stress if we did not manage it quick. So here we make this app to guide you on how you can cope with the bad stress.

 If you think stress only mess up with your mind, you should check our effect of stress section. You might want to manage your stress more serious after reading it.



features in this stress management app :

- stress factors
- how to overcome the stress
- how to prevent the stress
- the effects of stress
- checklist you should aware of about stress vs diet 


thank you for downloading. Feedback are most welcome for future better development.

title: Breathe2Relax
description: Breathe2Relax is a portable stress management tool which provides detailed information on the effects of stress on the body and instructions and practice exercises to help users learn the stress management skill called diaphragmatic breathing.Breathing exercises have been documented to decrease the body‚Äôs ‚Äòfight-or-flight‚Äô (stress) response, and help with mood stabilization, anger control, and anxiety management. Breathe2Relax can be used as a stand-alone stress reduction tool, or can be used in tandem with clinical care directed by a healthcare worker.

Best Stress Relief & Relaxation Techniques

Everyone deals with some form of stress in their life, and it‚Äôs not always easy to find relief. Family and work obligations, personal goals, financial issues; it can seem never-ending. 

But here‚Äôs the good news: there are simple ways to effectively manage your stress levels so that they never get to a point where you find yourself crippled by it.

- Find out how you can use a handful of simple strategies to minimize stress levels, regardless of how busy or chaotic your life is!

- Stress isn't always so easily avoided but when you uncover the top tips to effectively managing stress before it affects your life, you'll never struggle with stress and anxiety overload again!
Sure, there‚Äôs no possible way to avoid stress entirely. But there are ways of learning to identify stress triggers, manage stress levels and cope with the stress and anxiety you simply can‚Äôt avoid.

- Discover one of the top strategies to resetting your mind and body so you are able to feel calmer than ever before - even during stressful times!

- Learn how the top stress relief remedies in this special report will set you on the path towards living your very best life!

In this special report, we‚Äôll look at just some of the many ways you can improve the quality of your life by learning how to properly manage your stress levels.

- How to manage stress

Are you ready to finally learn how to quickly and efficiently manage your stress levels so you can live the life you deserve?

Let‚Äôs begin!

title: DeStressify-PRO Stress Relief
description:
Get stress relief that lasts. 

In as little as 10 minutes per day, learn life-changing skills for dealing with thoughts, emotions and beliefs that induce stress or anxiety. This comprehensive program addresses 5 key areas of stress relief: practices for calming the mind, emotional balance, relaxation, energizing exercises, and achieving joy. 

Techniques include guided imagery, visualizations, breathing and more. Watch a video exploring the causes of stress and your body‚Äôs physiological responses and discover how your thoughts and emotions are a key component. Learn about the right nutrition for optimal brain health. Schedule your exercise or self-care activities into your weekly routine. Listen to guided meditations or mindfulness exercises to experience a deep sense of calm right now. Let your cells resonate with some calming sound. You can customize the plan to fit your lifestyle and focus on the stress relief practices that best speak to you.

Contains over 45 FREE bonus audio and video stress relief exercises from doctors, psychologists, PhD‚Äôs and renowned experts including Jon Kabat-Zinn, Dan Siegel, Kelly McGonigal, Tara Brach, Caroline Myss, Jack Kornfield and more.

Includes the help you need to stick to your practice goals:

- Schedule your practice and get reminders
- Record your stress level over time to track your progress
- View practice history and see which practices work best for you
- Invite practice buddies to help keep motivated

Completely customizable:

- Customize your home screen for quick access to your favorites
- Customize your plan with any bonus practices or activities you prefer
- Add your own audio or video practices 


Begin to feel relief from stress right away. 

The core plan consists of 14 key practices to get you started. It is designed to cover everything you need to know in two weeks, practicing on average only 10 minutes per day. That is only about an hour and 15 minutes per week! The frequency of practicing is more important than the length of time spent each session so most sessions are built with a busy lifestyle in mind. 

The latest neuroscientific research indicates that with repetition, the neural pathways of the brain rewire themselves for the new behaviors. After only a few months of practice, the changes become permanent and automatic. And you experience stress relief that lasts! Regardless of the challenges you face in your health, career, or relationships, it is possible to deal with them in a healthier way. 

Download this app and start DeStressifying today!

comments: Simply the best. This app integrates a quarter century of western research with ancient practices and cutting edge technology. As a brain chemistry counsellor using all the techniques they work with, I was amazed and delighted to find an app that so well organized and delivers in the exact way for optimal brain reprogramming. I thought this would be years away from being in actual use. I use this for myself and in my therapy practice. very grateful.

This is more than just an app.   It's a life coach to living a happier and healthier lifestyle!   I really enjoyed customising a plan that best suits me.   Building from material from leading minds in the field in both the spiritual and scientific communities.   The tracking tools are great for seeing my progress and helping me adjust my plan.   Keeping me on track.   Great app!

title: The Relaxing Tree - an app for fast stress relief
description:
Add the Relaxing Tree as part of your guided meditations to quieten your mind and help you sleep or unwind.

Take a break and unwind as this app can help you de-stress and take back control of your mind.

Just sit comfortably, start the app and begin a restful 2-minute journey to inner calm.

Mental health experts and sleep professionals agree that meditation and deep breathing can ease stress, aid sleep and help you to manage panic attacks.

Improve general health and well-being by slowing your breathing with this guided meditation.

Unlike other breathing apps, our breathing app displays a beautifully animated tree which will grow and flourish as you breathe. It helps you to avoid mental distraction and experience mindful meditation more easily.

The combination of meditation sounds with images of nature has a powerful ability to relax and calm the mind.

FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Simple meditation - takes just 2 minutes
‚Ä¢ Can be used totally offline
‚Ä¢ No subscription
‚Ä¢ Meditate anytime, anywhere
‚Ä¢ Mindfulness made simple
‚Ä¢ Helps you focus on something else instead of panic or anxiety
‚Ä¢ Perfect for busy people
‚Ä¢ Use before bedtime to promote deep sleep

If you suffer from anxiety and stress, try this simple breathing exercise. It's proven that wellness apps, breathing techniques, physical exercises and a good diet can help to improve mental health. Use on your own, as a couple or with a friend or partner.

Deep breathing and mindful concentration can distract negative thinking and start to ease some of the symptoms of anxiety and mental health disorders.

People who are better at controlling stress in their lives generally experience more restful sleep, better relationships and happier lives.

This beautifully simple 2-minute meditation will help you to calm your mind, achieve healthy restfulness and promote inner happiness. Beautiful and simple graphics with relaxing sounds. Elegant design and one of the easiest to navigate breathing apps.

Incorporate 2 minutes of mindful breathing into your daily routine and experience the difference.

Download this app for free and experience the magic of The Relaxing Tree.

title: Elite HRV
description:
Heart Rate Variability with an emphasis on accuracy, professional quality, and ease of use. Track recovery and true stress levels. Boost resilience and your nervous system with guided breathing and live HRV biofeedback.

---------

**HRV Sensor Required

Recommended HRV Sensor: CorSense: https://elitehrv.com/corsense

Other compatible sensors: https://elitehrv.com/compatible-devices

---------

Integrates with Training Peaks, Heads Up Health, Final Surge, Strava, Google Fit, and Sport Tracks.

Whether training for a competition, preparing to nail a big presentation, or just trying to be healthier and perform better, Elite HRV is the simplest and most accurate way to measure your progress.

Elite HRV gives you:
 + Daily readiness to perform
 + Autonomic Nervous System balance gauge
 + Guided breathing / HRV Training
 + Live visual HRV and HR biofeedback
 + HRV Team Coaching Platform (for gyms, sports teams, health practices and personal training)

Important Elite HRV features:
 + HRV readings take as little as 60 seconds
 + Automated signal cleaning and artifact removal
 + Population data from the largest HRV database
 + Exportable data
 + Secure backup
 + Accuracy constantly tested by coaches, doctors, athletes and more

The Autonomic Nervous System is deeply connected to your body's physical, mental and emotional stress and recovery levels. In just 2 minutes per day, you gain a deeper understanding of the state of your body's recovery and ability to handle more stress (physical, mental, emotional, etc.).

Find out if you are parasympathetic dominant or sympathetic dominant - are you constantly in fight or flight (stress) mode?

Elite HRV's live biofeedback includes:
 + Live HRV visual display
 + Audio breathing guides
 + Visual breathing guides
 + Change breathing speed to match stress levels
 + Master stress and autonomic balance

HRV Readings can quickly be tagged with contextual data for more useful trending. Create your own custom tags or choose from many types of tags:
 + Exercise and RPE
 + Sleep tracking
 + Mood
 + Blood glucose
 + Bodyweight
 + Energy and soreness ratings
 + Custom user-defined tags
 + and more!

Using tags you can track heart rate recovery (HRR), post-exercise cooldown, the effects of alcohol or just about anything you can imagine. Our platform is designed to be flexible and customizable to suit your needs.

Elite HRV for Teams is live!

Automatically sync your daily readiness and Heart Rate Variability (HRV) scores to your coach, doctor, trainer or group leader. Teams, groups and gyms can analyze all of their members seamlessly as often as they like.

Take control of your stress and recovery today with Elite HRV.

** NOTE: A COMPATIBLE HEART RATE MONITOR IS REQUIRED. Bluetooth 4.0 is recommended. ANT+ is supported for some devices. See http://www.elitehrv.com/compatible-devices for more information on compatible devices.
descriptionHTML:
Heart Rate Variability with an emphasis on accuracy, professional quality, and ease of use. Track recovery and true stress levels. Boost resilience and your nervous system with guided breathing and live HRV biofeedback.

---------

**HRV Sensor Required

Recommended HRV Sensor: CorSense: https://elitehrv.com/corsense

Other compatible sensors: https://elitehrv.com/compatible-devices

---------

Integrates with Training Peaks, Heads Up Health, Final Surge, Strava, Google Fit, and Sport Tracks.

Whether training for a competition, preparing to nail a big presentation, or just trying to be healthier and perform better, Elite HRV is the simplest and most accurate way to measure your progress.

Elite HRV gives you:
+ Daily readiness to perform
+ Autonomic Nervous System balance gauge
+ Guided breathing / HRV Training
+ Live visual HRV and HR biofeedback
+ HRV Team Coaching Platform (for gyms, sports teams, health practices and personal training)

Important Elite HRV features:
+ HRV readings take as little as 60 seconds
+ Automated signal cleaning and artifact removal
+ Population data from the largest HRV database
+ Exportable data
+ Secure backup
+ Accuracy constantly tested by coaches, doctors, athletes and more

The Autonomic Nervous System is deeply connected to your body's physical, mental and emotional stress and recovery levels. In just 2 minutes per day, you gain a deeper understanding of the state of your body's recovery and ability to handle more stress (physical, mental, emotional, etc.).

Find out if you are parasympathetic dominant or sympathetic dominant - are you constantly in fight or flight (stress) mode?

Elite HRV's live biofeedback includes:
+ Live HRV visual display
+ Audio breathing guides
+ Visual breathing guides
+ Change breathing speed to match stress levels
+ Master stress and autonomic balance

HRV Readings can quickly be tagged with contextual data for more useful trending. Create your own custom tags or choose from many types of tags:
+ Exercise and RPE
+ Sleep tracking
+ Mood
+ Blood glucose
+ Bodyweight
+ Energy and soreness ratings
+ Custom user-defined tags
+ and more!

Using tags you can track heart rate recovery (HRR), post-exercise cooldown, the effects of alcohol or just about anything you can imagine. Our platform is designed to be flexible and customizable to suit your needs.

Elite HRV for Teams is live!

Automatically sync your daily readiness and Heart Rate Variability (HRV) scores to your coach, doctor, trainer or group leader. Teams, groups and gyms can analyze all of their members seamlessly as often as they like.

Take control of your stress and recovery today with Elite HRV.

** NOTE: A COMPATIBLE HEART RATE MONITOR IS REQUIRED. Bluetooth 4.0 is recommended. ANT+ is supported for some devices. See http://www.elitehrv.com/compatible-devices for more information on compatible devices.
summary: Accurate Heart Rate Variability (HRV) for fitness, wellness, and cognition
developerAddress:
Elite HRV
1 Haywood Street, Suite 401
Asheville, NC 28801
recentChanges: This release is short and sweet: just a couple of bug fixes to make life easier.
comments: Please allow us to run from SD card (ie external storage)? Totally out of internal storage here. It is just a simple setting that app developer needs to choose. TAGS: entering tags does not work. After years of using custom tags, I have given up as you've made it unusable. Even if you manage to find and select your tags (slow!!!), the final "add tags" at the top does not work at all (still stuck there 3 hours later). Please add Tai chi / qigong to types of activity as their HRV impact different

Great app for daily measurements, the app went through changes, initially simple, really easy to use, then cluttered hard to find anything, current stage is actually simple to use again. Definitely worth using. Great work by developers.
Seems to produce really great data. Good interface.. For a free app, it seems too good too be true! I say this in a good way.
Excellent app for monitoring heart rate variability. No ads and feature rich. Highly recommended.

Disappointed. I've used this app for years. I used to love it. The recent revision makes it harder to take readings - more screens to page through to get to the work, won't connect with my Polar H10, long delays for any function. It just isn't reliable, simple, or easy. I don't think they do any user testing to inform their design and flow engineering.

title: Nature Sounds :Peaceful, Sleep, Relax, Anti Stress
description:
Nature Sounds features beautifully crafted nature and ambient audio loops.Nature Sounds for Sleep is an app that helps you achieve and maintain your inner peace when you feel stress or just want to relax. Its core focus is to help you achieve enhanced relaxation state to release all your stress whenever you need it.

Amazing nature sounds and photos for relaxation, sleep, meditate, concentrate and study or if you have problems with insomnia or sleeping disorder.

If you want to relax, sleep better, and increase concentration?

This app is ideal for people who are tired from offices, and suffer from insomnia and had a hard day of work because it has natural soothing sounds of  waves, sound of water, sound of forest, sound of animals,sound of Birds,Sounds of mountains and many more...
Close your eyes, put on the headphones and choose one of the natural sounds and relax or sleep better.
