title: HOW TO CONTROL ANGER AND STRESS
description:
Anger is not necessarily a bad thing. It‚Äôs a completely natural emotion that everyone feels from time to time. Occasional anger, in fact, can be healthy. It helps you express your feelings and deal with situations.

Anger becomes a problem when it rises up too frequently and tends to get out of control. An anger problem can have a negative impact on all aspects of your life. It can have damaging effects on your relationships and family life, your job and your health.
But fortunately there are many strategies that can help you deal with your anger. If you are a hot-headed person, you cannot snap your fingers and instantly become calm and laid-back. But these easy-to-follow tips in this guide can help you to learn how to control your anger and prevent it from damaging your life.

Anger is an emotion that usually brings out the worst in everyone and constantly gets people into trouble and more often than not, an outburst of anger causes the individual to do and say things that are rather unpleasant.

Our life and the lives of those around us will be much better if we learn how to control our anger.

It‚Äôs ok to get angry sometimes, anger is a natural, human emotion, but it‚Äôs not ok when we get angry often. It means that there is something wrong in our life. This is why we've created this guide, It's here to help but in a calm effective way.

It‚Äôs ok to get angry sometimes, anger is a natural, human emotion, but it‚Äôs not ok when we get angry often. It means that there is something wrong in our life. This is why we've created this guide, It's here to help but in a calm effective way.
summary: How to Control Anger:Tips to Help You Stay Calm

title: Appiness stress, anxiety and depression relief
description:
Appiness is the leader community focused on mental wellbeing. We will help you relax your mind, calm down and fight anxiety, stress and depression. 

How Appiness will help you? We are the founders of a new methodology called Personal Debugging created through the combination of current psychology mastery, ancient meditation techniques and new disciplines like computer science. 

Have you ever questioned yourself why self-help, meditation apps and many relaxation techniques don't work as expected? Did you read tons of books about how to "feel better" or meditate and didn't work? Is your anxiety still there after that? Yes, mostly because they don't take into account the most important key of everything: yourself.  

How does it work? Personal Debugging helps you to learn about yourself, who you really are, the real YOU. And knowing yourself is the only driver to understand about your concerns and worries and tackle them in a proper way, only for you and your personality. Everyone is a different being. 

Who we are? Appiness are a group of professional experts in different areas (psychology, meditation and computer science) and a community of users that share the same concerns and walked the same way you are now. We focus on helping each other and mastering Personal Debugging. We will help you understand the cause of your concerns and adapt properly. 

In what areas can Personal Debugging help you?

* Learning about your personality traits and how they affect your life.
* Manage anxiety
* Fight common disorders such as stress or depression
* Sleep better
* Learn to relax and meditate.
* Mindfulness techniques.
* Improve your self-esteem
* Calm and relax and understanding the reasons sometimes you cannot easily achieve it

Appiness offers you:

* Discover your type of personality based on one of the 16 personality types and what are your traits.
* Track your stress, anxiety and depression levels.
* Relax and calm contents, such as guided meditation audios from different authors
* A community to share your thoughts, raise questions and read about hot topics related to mind concerns.
* A journal where you can track your daily thoughts and feelings.
* Lessons to learn about yourself based on Cognitive Behavioural Therapy
* Daily tasks about exercises, relax techniques to try and food recommendations to improve your mental and physical health

We hope we will really help you!

title: RCube: HRV Stress Test & Biofeedback
description:
About RCube

RCube is an effective app that protects & facilitates good judgement and decision making, productivity and health even under duress, and when exposed to change and in crisis. This is achieved through reducing negative stress, anxiety and low mood and by building positive resources for adaptive resilience and sustainable peak performance.

The Assessments and techniques are developed by our experienced medical team and are based on neuroscience, positive psychology, behavioural science and physiology. RCube offers an integrated approach towards building adaptive resilience, addressing mind and body simultaneously to achieve faster and more sustainable results.

What does RCube do

RCube supports companies who wish to help their employees reduce stress, anxiety, low mood and build emotional resilience. It helps your business in 3 ways:

1. Reducing stress, anxiety and low mood by protecting your employees from mental health problems   
2. Building emotional resilience helps your employees to develop a greater ability to cope with everyday hassles and major stressors
3. Physiological and neuro-psychological training exercises enhance workplace wellbeing and help to protect performance and productivity under pressure

Main features of RCube

Assessments
‚òÖ Wellbeing Check: Based on a symptom assessment, to personalise training programmes and track intensity of symptoms
‚òÖ Acute Stress Assessment: Based on real time heart rate variability to measure and track strain, engagement and recovery

 Personalised  Trainings
‚òÖ Acute Stress Release Techniques to assist in before, during and after experiencing challenging situations
‚òÖ Engagement Training is a audio-guided breathing exercise to reduce stress and anxiety and build resources for resilience and sustainable peak performance under pressure.
‚òÖ Biofeedback Training assesses the user's personal resonant frequency, which is the individual pace of breath that carries optimal training effects.  Once this resonant frequency is established through measuring heart rate variability with an oximeter, the Biofeedback training will default at this optimal pace. Resonant frequency can be updated on-demand to optimise the training. Whenever the oximeter is used during the Biofeedback Training , the real-time measurements will show the impact of the guided breath training on the physiological level of engagement.
‚òÖ Progressive Muscle Relaxation is a well- established deep relaxation technique that has been used to reduce stress (strain and tension) and anxiety; increase recovery and regeneration of body and mind and to prepare for good quality sleep. 
‚òÖ Constructive Worry & Constructive Gratitude exercises; based on cognitive and behavioural science and positive psychology to reduce stress, anxiety and low mood 
‚òÖ Nature Observation, Active Listening and Mindfulness exercises designed to reduce stress, enhance concentration, improve wellbeing and enhance communication.  

Learning & Development
‚òÖ Improve understanding of the cause and effect of stress, anxiety, anger and low mood
‚òÖ Improve awareness of the foundations of mental well-being

Progress Dashboard
   ‚òÖ Enhance and monitors the efficacy of every training session and tracks progress and results over time.

What are the benefits of using RCube?

Using the techniques for 10-20 minutes daily can benefit you in the following ways:

Health & Well-being
‚Ä¢	Improve your sleep
‚Ä¢	Boost recovery from strain and ill health
‚Ä¢	Rejuvenation (healthy ageing) 

Emotion Regulation
‚Ä¢	Deal more effectively with pressure, trauma, change and crisis
‚Ä¢	Reduce stress, anxiety, anger, fear and low mood 

Productivity at work (and home)
‚Ä¢	Access sustainable high-performance states of flow easily, even under pressure
‚Ä¢	Improve decision-making capacity in challenging circumstances 
‚Ä¢	Enhance creativity 
‚Ä¢	Boost confidence and access resources to handle problems
‚Ä¢	Improve social skills
